voice_assistant_use: Starting timers during cooking, searching for places in google maps
search_line1_content: Hey Hans, I would like to go to the movies, watching the new Wim Wenders movie. Do you know the times for my favorite cinema?
search_line2_content: Wait a moment, I will look it up for you. ...
search_line3_content: It looks like the movie is shown twice this evening. The first screening is at 20:00 and the second at 22:00 o'clock.
search_line4_content: 22:00 o'clock sounds good, then there's plenty of time to check out the new Burger place.
search_line5_content: Perfect, I will do a reservation for both.
music_line1_content: Hey Hans, would you mind to turn on the stereo and play some music while I cook?
music_line2_content: No problem should I start your  cooking with music  playlist?
music_line3_content: Sounds good, but actually I would love to hear some new music. Surprise me and play something you like!
music_line4_content: Ok, but if it is getting too funky just say it!
iot_line1_content: Is it ok if I turn off the lights when you fall asleep? You could probably safe some money ... and it is better for the environment!
iot_line2_content: You are right Hans, thanks for that!
volume_line1_content: Hey Hans, do you think the music is too loud. I don't want my neighbors to complain again ...
volume_line2_content: I checked the volume level from outside the apartment, I assume that it should be fine, but last time they complained it was just a little bit louder. So if you don't mind I would reduce some of the base by adjusting the EQ?
volume_line3_content: Sounds good! Thanks for checking!
weather_line1_content: Hey Hans, what would you pack for the trip to Italy?
weather_line2_content: Based on the weather forecast I would just pack shorts and stuff for the beach.
weather_line3_content: Don't you think, it could get chilly at night?
weather_line4_content: Ok, if you want to be on the safe side pack one set of warmer clothes. But that should be more than enough.
joke_line1_content: I just listened to all the stories you told and I remembered that we have a lot of pictures from these situations. If you don't mind I would show my personal favorites!
joke_line2_content: Good idea, but please skip the pictures of this years vacation, I already showed them to everyone.
joke_line3_content: Here are my favorite pictures of last Halloween. Personally this was my favorite costume, and if I remember correctly we listened to this artist all night. I turn up the music and play some of her tunes.
joke_line4_content: Great Hans! But don't overdo it with the volume, we don't want to disturb the neighbours again!
conversational_line1_content: Seems like you have trouble to fall asleep? Is everything ok with you?
conversational_line2_content: I have trouble to relax, there is so much going on in my head.
conversational_line3_content: Should I turn on the TV and play the news channel? You always fall asleep during the news?
conversational_line4_content: Probably a good idea ...
conversational_line5_content: I turn it off when you are asleep, if the volume is too loud just say something, good night.
conversational_line6_content: Good night Hans.
alarm_line1_content: Hey Hans, can you make sure that I don't oversleep tomorrow morning? I have an important meeting at 7:00.
alarm_line2_content: No problem I will wake you at least one hour before that and prepare a coffee so that you are really awake.
alarm_line3_content: Thanks Hans!

voice_assistant_use: - Navigate music  - weather   - news  - traffic updates
search_line1_content: What movies are playing in my local cinema?
search_line2_content: Lists the movies that are playing.
music_line1_content: Turn the music box to  90s rap
music_line2_content: Here is music based on your selection.
iot_line1_content: I am about to go to bed. Can you turn the lights off after 30 min?
iot_line2_content: Sure thing.
volume_line1_content: From your front-door video, I can see your neighbor approaching. Shall I turn the music down?
volume_line2_content: Good idea. Last time they were complaining about it.
volume_line3_content: I know. Music has been lowered to y.
weather_line1_content: Based on the weather and the location, what do you recommend me packing for the trip?
weather_line2_content: In the area, you can do the following things x, y, z. Are you planning on doing them all?
weather_line3_content: I will only do y.
weather_line4_content: In that case, you will only be lying at the beach. You only need to pack beach stuff, which is the following: (Lists items)
weather_line5_content: Can you track what I am packing? I will name it out loud. And let me know what I missed at the end?
weather_line6_content: Yes, I will keep a list and cross-check at the end.
joke_line1_content: We have run out of topics to talk about
joke_line2_content: I have two options: They can either go home, as it will start raining in 30 min or I can tell you about the news this week, so you have more topics to talk about.
joke_line3_content: My friend Lisa would like to go home. How long will it take her and will she get in the rain?
joke_line4_content: It will take her y minutes and if she leaves now she won't get wet.
conversational_line1_content: I can't fall asleep.
conversational_line2_content: That's annoying. I have the following solutions for you: Play background noise or read a story.
conversational_line3_content: Play background music
conversational_line4_content: Based on your preferences I will play x.
conversational_line5_content: I am not up for that. What about something with waves.
conversational_line6_content: Here we go. (Plays music)
conversational_line8_content: Sure.
alarm_line1_content: Set an alarm for x for tomorrow.
alarm_line2_content: I have set an alarm for x for tomorrow. shall I set a second one 15 min later. You were late to your meeting last time.
alarm_line3_content: Sounds like a good idea. Yes.
alarm_line4_content: I have set another alarm for z for tomorrow.

voice_assistant_use: For fun

search_line2_content: Here is what You looking for (shedule for local cinema)

weather_line2_content: Here it is (showing me this)

joke_line2_content: (telling funny story)

conversational_line2_content: Ok, (telling me a story from a book or something like that)

alarm_line2_content: Ok, no problem

search_line3_content: Saturday evenings would suit me best.
search_line4_content: They play it at 7:30 pm on Saturday. Do you want me to book it?
search_line5_content: Oh yes, thats perfect. Lets book 2seats for me and my girlfriend.
search_line6_content: Your tickets are printed in your office. Have fun!
search_line7_content: Thanks Masno.
music_line1_content: Hey Masno, I love listening musick while i cooking, could you play my favourite playlist?
music_line2_content: Ofcourse, Do you like to shuffle tracks?
music_line3_content: Umm, No lets play them normal.
iot_line1_content: Hey Masno, you know i snoring every night.
iot_line2_content: Yes, you are so loud.
iot_line3_content: Great, Could you turn lights off when i start snoring?
iot_line4_content: Ofcourse i can.
volume_line1_content: Hey, your neighbours send me an email that you again listen music loud.
volume_line2_content: Thanks Masno for the warning, Please turn the music down a little bit.
volume_line3_content: Im set up music for 45 loudness
weather_line1_content: Hey Masno, what weather  would be in Rome in two days?
weather_line2_content: Rainfall and gusts of wind are predicted in Rome
weather_line3_content: Ohh, Could you check if my jackets and warm sweather are already laundered?
weather_line4_content: Ofcourse, let me see. Your laundry are already done. Do you wanna pack them ?
weather_line5_content: Yes, i would need them in Rome.
weather_line6_content: So that you don't waste your time, your clothes are on the second shelf in wardrobe
joke_line1_content: Hey Masno, Play some fun movies on TV.
joke_line2_content: Whats you pick: Funny Animals, Fails or Comedy Film?
conversational_line1_content: Hey Masno, i having trouble to fall asleep.
conversational_line2_content: How can i help you?
conversational_line3_content: Could you set up water in kettle, I need to brew herbs for sleep.
conversational_line4_content: Ofcourse, i turning on kettle. Maybe relaxing music?
conversational_line5_content: Ohh yes, thats fantastic idea, lets start my favourite playlist.
alarm_line1_content: reminder; You have scheduled your meeting at 8:30AM
alarm_line2_content: Ahh crap, please setup alarmclock at 7:45AM
alarm_line3_content: If i still will be snoring, Play loud music and start bed vibration.

joke_line2_content: 1. Now that’s what I call stupid: In my junior year of high school, this guy asked me on a date. He rented a Redbox movie and made a pizza. We were watching the movie and the oven beeped so the pizza was done. He looked me dead in the eye and said, “This is the worst part.” I then watched this boy open the oven and pull the pizza out with his bare hands, rack and all, screaming at the top of his lungs. We never had a second date.

voice_assistant_use: I make use of voice assistants to know weather info, to turn on/off music, to be aware of daily exchange rates, and I've been using Alexa a lot lately since I discovered that it can read my ebooks for me. I plan on having a smart home, so the use of voice assistants in my life will be quite frequent.
search_line1_content: Assistant, at what time can I watch Tenet at my local cinema tomorrow?
search_line2_content: Since you have a birthday to attend tomorrow at 3pm, I would recommend you to buy your ticket for 7:30pm.
search_line3_content: Could you do that for me? I want two seats, no preference. I want some popcorn too, order 2 menus.
search_line4_content: Ok, would you like me to remind you tomorrow about it?
search_line5_content: Yes, please! Also, send a message to Alice and tell her I already got us the tickets.
music_line1_content: Assistant, what can i use in my recipe instead of wine? I forgot I needed it.
music_line2_content: I'm sure you can use the grape juice you bought yesterday. If I'm correct it's currently in the fridge downstairs.
music_line3_content: Thank you so much! I also forgot about that.
music_line4_content: That's okay, that's why I'm here. If you'd like I could also order some wine delivery, but it would take aproximately 30 minutes to arrive.
music_line5_content: That's not necessary but I'm happy to know we have options. Thanks again!
music_line6_content: My pleasure!
music_line7_content: Could you please turn on my favorite playlist? I would love to cook listening to some music.
music_line8_content: Of course! It's one of my favorite playlists too.
iot_line1_content: Assistant, could you set my bedroom lights to turn off in 30 minutes?
iot_line2_content: Sure.
iot_line3_content: Would you dim them for me right now?
iot_line4_content: Absolutely, do you have a presetting in mind?
iot_line5_content: Set the bedroom lights with the Reading settings.
iot_line6_content: Done.
volume_line1_content: Assistant, could you turn my device volume to 30%?
volume_line2_content: Sure, it's already done.
volume_line3_content: Thank you so much.
weather_line1_content: Assistant, what are the current weather in Venice?
weather_line2_content: It's sunny, currently 30°C.
weather_line3_content: What about the weather for the weekend?
weather_line4_content: It's supposed to have a storm by Friday, and it appears that it will rain until Monday.
weather_line5_content: Oh, that sucks! Thank you anyway.
joke_line1_content: Assistant, could you please tell us a joke?
joke_line2_content: Sure. You.
joke_line3_content: Oh, that's low. Can you pick us a comedy movie to watch instead?
joke_line4_content: Of course. I would recommend your favorite franchise, Scream.
conversational_line1_content: Assistant, could you read Throne of Glass for me?
conversational_line2_content: Of course, if I'm correct you are already on chapter 15, right?
conversational_line3_content: Yes! Thanks for that.
conversational_line4_content: No problem!
conversational_line5_content: Could you also highlight a quote for me? I would like to highlight the previous paragraph.
conversational_line6_content: Done, do you want to leave a note too?
conversational_line7_content: Not really, but thanks for asking, I forgot I could do that.
alarm_line1_content: Assistant, could you please set an alarm to 5am on every device?
alarm_line2_content: Ok, done. Do you need anything else?
alarm_line3_content: Set the volume up for every device as well.

voice_assistant_use: I use voice assistants when I need to dial someone's number when I'm in hurry for example, or when I'm searching for something, like information, restaurants, bars and such.
search_line1_content: Hey Nate, at what time does the latest Avengers movie premiere in the nearest cinema?
search_line2_content: Avengers Endgame premieres at 15:30 in Cinema City, would you like me to make a reservation?
music_line1_content: Hey Nate, what should I cook tonight?
music_line2_content: For how many people are you cooking?
music_line4_content: What do you want eat?
music_line6_content: Would you like light or rich dish?
music_line7_content: I lean more towards rich dish.
music_line8_content: I recommend spaghetti ala carbonara, would you like me to search for recipe?
music_line9_content: No, thank you, I would like to listen to a music whilst cooking though.
music_line10_content: I recommend Italian dinner music, may I recommend classical music?
iot_line1_content: Hey Nate, what book should I read before bed?
iot_line2_content: What is your desirable genre?
iot_line3_content: I would like to read something light, something I don't have to think about yet something that's not entirely boring.
iot_line4_content: I recommend Beloved by Tomi Morrison.
volume_line1_content: I have detected a higher music volume, would you like me to lower it? There may be complaints if I won't do so.
volume_line2_content: No, I like this way of listening to music, what should I do?
volume_line3_content: I recommend installing noise insulation, would you like me to search for nearest assets?
weather_line1_content: Hey Nate, what is the weather going to be like in Italy next week?
weather_line2_content: Generally, it is going to be sunny with high temperatures , what specific area do you have in mind?
weather_line3_content: I will be visiting southern part of Italy around the are of Catanzaro.
weather_line4_content: Weather forecast shows sunny and high temperatures around 35 °C.
weather_line5_content: What clothing should I be packing then?
weather_line6_content: I recommend light clothing with a head cover.
joke_line1_content: Hey Nate, search for funny drunk stories.
joke_line2_content: Is it a formal or casual event?
conversational_line1_content: Hey Nate, I can't fall asleep, what should I do?
conversational_line2_content: I recommend that you calm your thoughts and instead think about calm places or alternatively take a medication, in which case I can search for the nearest pharmacy.
alarm_line1_content: Hey Nate, wake me up at 6:00 AM and set another snooze alarm for 6:05 AM so I don't oversleep.
alarm_line2_content: Is this single event, or should set it as regular alarm.
alarm_line3_content: It is single event and please repeat both if I won't turn off either of them.

voice_assistant_use: To find out about my local news.  To tune into my local radio, ask questions, play games with my son and listen to music.
search_line1_content: Sian could you tell me where my local cinema is and what times film is showing?
search_line2_content: Your local cinema is..., 4 miles from home
search_line3_content: Film... is hoping at ...
search_line4_content: Great, thanks Sian.
music_line1_content: Sian can you play some music while I cook a dinner?
music_line2_content: yes what genre would you prefer?
music_line4_content: I notice you like to listen to hip hop so I will play a collection from that genre.
iot_line1_content: Sian can you set a timer for the lights to turn off?
iot_line2_content: Yes certainly, what time would you like me to turn the lights off?
iot_line3_content: In 45 minutes from now.
iot_line4_content: OK, that is a timer set for the lights to turn out.
iot_line6_content: No problem, relax and have a good night's sleep.
iot_line7_content: Goodnight Sian
volume_line1_content: Sian can you lock in the volume of music to low after 10pm
volume_line2_content: Certainly, what volume would you like?
volume_line3_content: lock at volume 4
volume_line4_content: volume 4 locked in for anytime from 10pm.
volume_line5_content: Thank you Sian
weather_line1_content: Sian, can you tell me about the average weather in Italy for this time of year?
weather_line2_content: Yes, where in Italy would you like to know about?
weather_line3_content: Italy in general
weather_line4_content: OK, the average weather in Italy for this time of year is...
weather_line6_content: Would you like to know of local shops that would sell weather related garments incase you need them?
weather_line8_content: Can you tell me where you are staying?
weather_line9_content: Yes I am staying at...
weather_line10_content: You have a shop that is a 6 minute walk from your hotel and other shops that would be a 10 minute or 20 minute walk
weather_line11_content: Can you give me directions so I can write them down?
weather_line12_content: When you come out of your hotel take a right, at the end of that road take a left, you will come to a cross road, go straight down there, the shop is on your left and is called...
joke_line1_content: Sian can you tell us a funny story?
joke_line2_content: In what context?
joke_line3_content: Some of a comedians jokes from their show?
joke_line4_content: Who is your favourite comedian?
joke_line6_content: OK, Sarah milligan jokes will play for you now.
conversational_line1_content: I notice your lights are still on, can you not sleep?
conversational_line2_content: Hi Sian, I am having trouble falling asleep
conversational_line3_content: I can play some calming soothing voice or music that will help you get over.
conversational_line4_content: Yes please.
conversational_line5_content: I will play, name and author of song...
conversational_line6_content: Thank you Sian
alarm_line1_content: Sian can you set multiple alarms from 6am to make sure I am awake for an important meeting?
alarm_line2_content: Yes, I will set multiple alarms, is every 15 minutes OK?
alarm_line3_content: perfect.
alarm_line4_content: Would you like me to remind you why you have to get up with each alarm.
alarm_line5_content: Yes please, thank you.
alarm_line6_content: OK, alarms set from 6am for every 15 minutes with reminders for each alarm.
scenario_open_description: Sian, my son is doing a school project on the lifecycle of butterfly. I do not know too much about it.
open_line1_content: Can you tell my son about the lifecyxle of a butterfly.
open_line2_content: Hello Oliver a butterfly starts off as a caterpillar...
open_line3_content: He has got that wrote down, can you tell him a short story of a butterfly?
open_line4_content: Well this little caterpillar....
open_line5_content: Did that help with your project Oliver?
open_line6_content: yes thank you Sian

voice_assistant_use: General questions regarding weather, news etc. Controlling smart home products.
search_line1_content: Hi Assistant, can you let me know the showing times at the local cinema, please?
search_line2_content: Sure, which film would you like to go and see?
search_line3_content: The Terminator
search_line4_content: Ooh, great! There are showings at 6pm, 8pm and 10pm.
search_line5_content: Thanks assistant. Bye!
search_line6_content: Have a great time at the movies tonight and don't forget,  I'll be back
music_line1_content: Assistant, please play some rock music.
music_line2_content: Radio or Playlist?
music_line4_content: Which station?
music_line6_content: Thank you. Now playing Planet Rock.
iot_line1_content: Hi Assistant, I'm going to bed to read a book. Hopefully I don't fall asleep before turning the lights off. But just in case please can you turn all lights off after 60 minutes.
iot_line2_content: Hey, I'll turn all lights off after 60 minutes have gone by. Enjoy your book and goodnight!
volume_line1_content: Hey assistant, please limit the music volume to 50% for 24 hours.
volume_line2_content: Hi, volume limited to 50% for 24 hours. Have fun!
weather_line1_content: Hi Assistant, what's the water like in Italy for the next two days?
weather_line2_content: Hey! Where about in Italy are you heading?
weather_line3_content: Turin
weather_line4_content: Wonderful! The weather in Turin is magnificent at the moment. Clear sunny skies and warm temperatures.
weather_line6_content: Around 28 degrees.
weather_line8_content: No worries. Enjoy your trip!
joke_line1_content: Hey Assistant, tell us a joke!
joke_line2_content: Knock Knock...
joke_line4_content: Interrupting Cow.
joke_line6_content: MOO!
conversational_line1_content: Assistant, I'm having trouble falling asleep.
conversational_line2_content: I'm sorry to hear that. There are numerous techniques for helping aid sleep. Would you like to hear them?
conversational_line3_content: Yes, please.
conversational_line4_content: Ok. You can count sheep. Make sure you are in a dark quiet room. Or even, play calming sounds. Would you like me to play calming sounds?
conversational_line5_content: Yes please. Play calming sounds for 15 minutes.
conversational_line6_content: Sure. I will switch off the sounds after 15 minutes have passed. Goodnight!
alarm_line1_content: Assistant, please set an alarm for 6.30am that recurs every 5 minutes. I have an important meeting and I want to make sure I don't miss it.
alarm_line2_content: Hey, I will set an alarm for 6.30am. This will recur every 5 minutes until you say  Assistant, I am up and ready for the day!
scenario_open_description: I want to impress a date and cook a wonderful 3 course dinner.
open_line1_content: Hey assistant. I need your help!
open_line2_content: Sure, what is it?
open_line3_content: I've got a date tonight. She's coming round for dinner and I really want to impress!
open_line4_content: Ok, well make sure to set a great mood with the environment and make a lovely dinner.
open_line5_content: Assistant, can you give me some ideas and recipes for dinner?
open_line6_content: Sure, try a Souffle Suissesse. Made famous by the Roux brothers. It will be sure to impress!
open_line7_content: Thanks Assistant.

voice_assistant_use: The occasional google search, asking for the weather/temperature on a given day, ask for the route to a certain place.

weather_line5_content: Thanks. I'll make sure I'm ready for all kinds of weather.

alarm_line3_content: Great.

open_line10_content: ok, let me look at what options are available

voice_assistant_use: Listening to music, the radio, getting updates on the weather, making lists, navigating my phone and ipad
search_line1_content: Hey Ana, what is today's schedule at the local cinema
search_line2_content: Let me check that for you. If you want to hear a synopsis of the movie at any time, just say  SYNOPSIS .
search_line3_content: *tells me the film times* - do you want me to make a booking for any of the films today?
search_line4_content: Yes please, please book 2 tickets for the 8:00pm showing of XYZ.
search_line5_content: Got it. That's all booked for you. The confirmation email will be with you shortly. Enjoy the movie
music_line1_content: Hey Ana, please open Spotify
music_line2_content: Do you want to listen to music from your library or a playlist?
music_line4_content: Would you like to listen to any artist in particular? Or would you like me to shuffle all your saved songs?
music_line6_content: Right away. If you want to skip a song, say  Next . Enjoy!
iot_line1_content: Hey Ana. When my smart watch detects that I have been asleep for 10 minutes, please switch off the lights
iot_line2_content: Understood. If I switch the lights off too soon, just say  LIGHTS ON .
iot_line3_content: Thanks Ana
volume_line1_content: Hey, remember that your neighbours don't share your taste in music. Do you want me to turn it down a little?
volume_line2_content: Oops! Yes please, thanks Ana
volume_line3_content: You're welcome. If you want to turn it up again, just say  VOLUME UP .
weather_line1_content: Hey Ana, what is the weather like in Italy this week?
weather_line2_content: It's raining on Sunday and Monday but then mild and dry for the rest of the week
weather_line3_content: Thanks. How heavy will the rain be?
weather_line4_content: Light showers on Sunday and moderately heavy rain throughout most of Monday.
joke_line1_content: Hey Ana, can you suggest a fun game for us to play as a group?
joke_line2_content: Sure. Do you have anything with you, like cards or dice?
joke_line4_content: Understood. Have you ever played charades?
joke_line6_content: Do you want a reminder of the rules to you?
joke_line7_content: Yes please
joke_line8_content: I will send a prompt to your phone and you have to act it out in front of your friends without words. You have 30 seconds to make yourself understood, and then I will sound a timer. I will then send the next prompt to someone else's phone and the game continues. Sound good?
joke_line9_content: Yes, sounds great. Thanks Ana
joke_line10_content: No problem! Good luck and have fun, I'm sending you a prompt now
conversational_line1_content: Hey Ana, I can't sleep
conversational_line2_content: Sorry to hear that. Is there a specific problem you need help with?
conversational_line3_content: No, I'm just having difficulty falling alseep
conversational_line4_content: Do you want me to play you a relaxing playlist or sleep cast?
conversational_line5_content: Can you play me a sleep cast about going on holiday?
conversational_line6_content: Sure, let me look through the library. I've found one I think you'll like - say  STOP  if you want to switch to a different story
conversational_line8_content: No problem, sleep well
alarm_line1_content: Hey Ana, I have a big meeting in the morning, please set an alarm for 6:00am
alarm_line2_content: Sure. Do you want me to switch off the option to snooze?
alarm_line3_content: Yes please
alarm_line4_content: Got it. Do you want an alarm tone or the radio to play?
alarm_line5_content: An alarm tone please, at the loudest setting. Please don't switch the alarm off until I open the fridge door so I'm definitely out of bed.
alarm_line6_content: Understood. I have set the alarm for 6:00am, speak to you in the morning.
scenario_open_description: I'm making a shopping list
open_line1_content: Hey Ana, please get ready to make a list of groceries. I'll be shopping at Tesco.
open_line2_content: Sure. Do you want me to tell you if we already have an item you're trying to list in the fridge?
open_line3_content: Yes please - *starts to list items*
open_line4_content: You already have eggs in the fridge. Do you want to add them to the list anyway?
open_line5_content: Yes, I need more for a recipe I'm making. *continues to list items*
open_line6_content: Pak choi is currently out of stock on tesco.com. Do you want to add cabbage instead?
open_line7_content: Yes please. *finishes listing items*. And that's it
open_line8_content: Great. The total on tesco.com will be £45.87. Do you want to order online or are you going to go to the store?
open_line9_content: I'll be going to the store
open_line10_content: Okay, I will add the list to the memo app on your phone. Have a good trip!

voice_assistant_use: I use google assistant to: set a timer when cooking food, creating an alarm in the morning to wake me up, finding out what the weather will be like, adding items to my shopping list, to turn devices on around the house connected to google such as the tv and lights, to play music via spotify or the radio, and to ask questions ad hoc e.g. during a conversation or discussion and we dont know the answer.

joke_line1_content: Kitt, tell us a story
joke_line2_content: What sort of story would you like to hear?
joke_line4_content: OK, try this one. Did you hear about the man that won the lottery twice?
joke_line6_content: Bill Morgan’s life has been full of luck – good and bad.  He should have died in June 1998 - and for 14 minutes he did - but somehow doctors managed to revive him after he had a heart attack and spent 15 days in a coma. Mr Morgan, then 37 and living in a caravan park in Melbourne's outer suburbs, was dubbed a 'medical miracle'.  His second lucky break came when he bought an instant scratchcard about a year later and promptly won a brand new Toyota Corolla worth $30,000. The windfall attracted plenty of media attention. And that's when it happened - his claim to viral video fame that's re-emerged some 22 years later and is on everyone's Facebook news feed. The footage captures Mr Morgan buying another scratchcard to re-create the moment for a TV program - only to win the jackpot. 'I just won $250,000 - I'm not joking,' he says in disbelief to the camera. 'I think I'll have another heart attack.'   The extraordinary win and the subsequent call to his fiancee to tell her she could buy a house was shown on Nine's evening news in Melbourne, and then around the world via CNN and the BBC.

voice_assistant_use: In all honesty I've never had a compelling reason to use a voice assistant. I suppose I might be interested in using one to call contacts more easily, but that's all that comes to mind.
search_line1_content: Suzy, can you check the showing times for FILM, please?
search_line2_content: The nearest cinema has FILM showing at 1800 and 2100 today.
search_line3_content: Suzy, are there any other showing times?
search_line4_content: It has extra showings at 1000 and 1300 on Saturdays and Sundays.
search_line5_content: Suzy, that's great, thanks.
search_line6_content: Would you like to order a ticket?
search_line7_content: Suzy, not just now, thanks.
search_line8_content: OK.
music_line1_content: Suzy, could you put some music on in the kitchen, please?
music_line2_content: OK - what would you like?
music_line3_content: Suzy, one of my REO Speedwagon albums, please.
music_line4_content: OK - playing  Nine Lives .
iot_line1_content: Suzy, can you turn the lights off an hour and a half from now, please?
iot_line2_content: OK .
volume_line1_content: Suzy, can you turn the music down a bit, please?
volume_line2_content: OK - this is 10% lower.
volume_line3_content: Suzy, Thanks - still a bit loud, I think. Can you turn it down again by the same amount, please?
volume_line4_content: Turning down again - how's this?
volume_line5_content: Suzy - just once more, please.
volume_line6_content: Sorry - that's a bit ambiguous. Can you give me more detail, please?
volume_line7_content: Suzy - sorry, can you lower the music volume by the same amount again, please?
volume_line8_content: Will do - is this any better?
volume_line9_content: Suzy, that's fine. Can you store that volume as  OK for the neighbours , please?
weather_line1_content: Suzy, what's the weather going to be like in Italy for the next week?
weather_line2_content: It's a bit variable depending on the location. Can you be a bit more precise, please?
weather_line3_content: Suzy, what's the weather going o be like in Venice, Italy for the next week?
weather_line4_content: I'm putting the weekly forecast for Venice, Italy up on the TV screen now.

music_line6_content: OK, I've found a playslist for you starting with Bat out of Hell

weather_line3_content: Yes please
weather_line4_content: On the day you arrive it will be 29 degrees with little or no chance of rain and very light winds. The forecast for the 7 days after is very similar with temperatures ranging from 27 to 31 degrees and no sign of any rain.
weather_line5_content: Thanks, i might need some more shorts and sunscreen then.
weather_line6_content: Adding shorts and sunscreen to your shopping list
weather_line8_content: No problem

conversational_line2_content: What seems to be the problem?

alarm_line4_content: You will hear it on your bedroom speaker but need to touch the unit in the kitchen to switch it off
alarm_line5_content: Very clever
alarm_line6_content: I try

weather_line4_content: You've got it, no problem
joke_line1_content: Hey assistant, have there been any good dissappearance mysteries in the news lately.
joke_line2_content: There have yes, would you like to know more?
joke_line3_content: Yes, tell us the full story, all the details you have on the most exciting one.
joke_line4_content: A man named John Smith was out hiking with a friend in California on September 5th 2020 at approximately 0911am when he went behind a bush to relieve himself but never returned. His friend searched for him as did the local sherrifs and search and rescue, but there was no trace of him even when they took out tracking dogs. Despite exhaustive searches, they haven't found any clues. There were however multiple strange objects spotted in the sky around that time and others further down the mountain reported seeing a beam of light with a silouhette of a man suspended in it, many believe he was abducted.
joke_line5_content: Hey asisstant, if there are any further updates on the story, please send it to me and everyone here.
joke_line6_content: No problem, will do.

conversational_line2_content: You could try meditation, some music or a short yoga session?

conversational_line4_content: Good choice, would you prefer a male or female voice?
conversational_line6_content: Sit back and relax, this is a short session designed to guide you to sleep

alarm_line4_content: I can demonstrate it now for you, it is a loud siren sound, should I give you a test?
alarm_line5_content: Yes let's hear it
alarm_line6_content: Here you go.

scenario_open_description: I have a red whine stain on my t-shirt and don't know what to use to remove it.
open_line1_content: Hey assistant what removes red whine stains from a white t-shirt?
open_line2_content: Can you tell me what fabric the t-shirt is made from, try checking the label.
open_line3_content: It says it is 100% cotton
open_line4_content: Is the stain fresh or dried
open_line5_content: It's dry, from last night
open_line6_content: Ok, in that case soaking the t-shirt to loosen the stain first will give it the best chance of coming out. Grab your washing bowl, boil some warm water and get the bicarbonate of soda from under the sink. Let me know when you are ready with everything
open_line7_content: Ok I have everything you said
open_line8_content: Ok great, go ahead and put 2 cups of the bicarbonate of soda in the bowl and let is dissolve.
open_line10_content: Ok, now sprinkle some on to the stain on the shirt and gently rub it in with your fingers.
open_line12_content: Great, now submerge the shirt into the bowl and just leave it to soak.In about an hour we can remove it and place it in the washer. Do you want me to set a timer to remind you to remove it when it's done soaking
open_line14_content: OK that's set, I will remind you.

search_line1_content: Hey Bennie, which cinema is the closest to me that has showings of 'film' tonight?
search_line2_content: 'Cinema1' is the closest cinema, but it only has one showing. I would recommend 'Cinema2', it is slightly further, but it has more showings.
search_line3_content: What time is the showing at 'Cinema1'?
search_line5_content: Oh no, that is too early. Are there any showings around 8 at 'Cinema2'?
search_line6_content: There is a showing at 8:10. Would you like me to book it?
search_line7_content: Yes please, can you book 2 recliners, one for me and one for my sister?
search_line8_content: Absolutely, bear with me a second.
search_line9_content: All sorted, you have center seats on the back row, just as you like. You can find your tickets in your emails.

music_line2_content: Absolutely! Here's a mix from Spotify.

iot_line2_content: I'll whisper to you in an hour. If you don't answer, I'll turn off the lights. If you do, i'll try again in 30 minutes.
iot_line3_content: Sounds good.
iot_line4_content: Good night!
volume_line1_content: Hey, I'm just letting you know the music is quite loud. Would you like me to do anything about it?
volume_line2_content: Oh yeah, the neighbours might complain. Can you do anything to minimise what they hear without me turning down the music?
volume_line3_content: I can shut the bedroom and kitchen windows, and also close the doors between each room if you'd like?
volume_line4_content: That sounds perfect. Let me know if you think there could be a problem after that.
volume_line5_content: I think it might still be a little too loud. Would you like me to turn down the bass slightly?
volume_line6_content: Yes please.
volume_line7_content: All sorted, that should avoid any issues.
weather_line1_content: Hey Bennie, whats the weather like in Rome today?
weather_line2_content: The temperature is 30 degrees celsius. It is sunny, with no chance of cloud or rain.
weather_line3_content: Is the weather going to be the same in two days?
weather_line4_content: There may be some light cloud in the coming days, but the temperature is not expected to change.
weather_line5_content: Is that typical for this time of year?
weather_line6_content: It's slightly warmer than you might expect, but nothing too out of the ordinary. Are you packing for your trip?
weather_line7_content: Yes, and I'm not sure what to wear.
weather_line8_content: Light clothing is better, and clothes that cover your skin from the sun during the day might be best. Don't forget your sunglasses!
joke_line1_content: Hey Bennie, do you know any funny stories?
joke_line2_content: Not personally, no. However, I know some people who do. Would you like me to find them?
joke_line4_content: No problem. Here is a clip of 'comedian panel show' from Youtube.
conversational_line1_content: Bennie, I'm having some problems falling asleep.
conversational_line2_content: (in a quiet voice) Ok, would you like me to boil the kettle for a cup of tea?
conversational_line3_content: Yes please, thanks.
conversational_line4_content: I'll also play some quiet relaxed classical music for the next half an hour or so, until you fall asleep.
conversational_line6_content: Sleep tight.
alarm_line1_content: Remember to wake up on time for your important meeting!
alarm_line2_content: Oh yeah! Bennie, can you make sure I don't oversleep?
alarm_line3_content: I can try! You have an alarm set for 7; I will start the coffee machine at 5 minutes to 7.
alarm_line4_content: I think I will need more than that.
alarm_line5_content: Of course. I will also start playing the radio at 7 for 20 minutes. You will not be able to turn this off. Is that ok?
alarm_line6_content: That's brilliant, thank you Bennie.
alarm_line7_content: Goodnight!

search_line8_content: Usual location in the cinema

voice_assistant_use: I've tested out the Google Assistant the most as I tested it out as a gift to my parents and had to show how it works and set it up for them.    I tested out Cortana for a short while and briefly used Siri on a friends iPad but after a short while found that they are not that useful for my own personal needs. Therefore I don't regularly use any of them.

voice_assistant_use: I occasionally use Google Assistant and Cortana to browse the internet if I am cooking and have no hands to use my phone, or my hands are dirty.    I have used Alexa a couple of times when at a friend's house, to set the heating or lighting.
search_line1_content: Hey Monkey, can you get me the show times for Tenet at the local cinema?
search_line2_content: Sure, what day would you like to go?
search_line3_content: Are there any times left for today?
search_line4_content: Yes. Would you prefer afternoon or evening?
search_line5_content: Probably evening. What times are available before/after dinner? We'll go out for dinner too.
search_line6_content: At Dudley cinema the showtimes for this evening are 19:00, 20:00, or 21:00.
search_line7_content: Okay, I think the 20:00 would be best.
search_line8_content: Would you like me to book tickets?
search_line9_content: Yes please, 2 adult tickets. Back row seats if they are available.
search_line10_content: Done. Would you like me to make you a dinner reservation too?
music_line1_content: Can you play me some music please Monkey?
music_line2_content: Of course. What do you fancy.
music_line4_content: Would you like me to play a mix of your favourites?
music_line5_content: Yes please, that sounds good. I'm cooking dinner.
music_line6_content: Okay, I'll play you enough songs to get you to the dinner table.
iot_line1_content: I've noticed you've been leaving the lights on all night.
iot_line2_content: I know. It's when I read in bed. I fall asleep and forget to turn them out.
iot_line3_content: Did you want me to turn them off for you?
iot_line4_content: I don't want the lights to go out when I'm still reading!
iot_line5_content: I could turn them off at a certain time of night.
iot_line6_content: Yes, I'm usually asleep within an hour of going to bed.
iot_line7_content: So do you want me to turn them off at 11:00pm?
iot_line8_content: Will it make much difference whether they are on or off?
iot_line9_content: It'll save electricity. On your current plan, you would save £3.00 per month by turning out the lights every night.
iot_line10_content: Could you start turning out the lights then, and move £3.00 per month from my current account into my savings account? I'll use it to save for a weekend break!
volume_line1_content: Do you think your music is a bit loud? Don't want the neighbours to complain.
volume_line2_content: Sounds okay to me.
volume_line3_content: This is the volume it was at when we got a complaint last time. Can I turn it down just a notch?
volume_line4_content: Go on then.
weather_line1_content: Your calendar trip to Italy is only two days away. Exciting! Do you need help with packing?
weather_line2_content: Yes please Monkey, I don't know what clothes to pack. Do you think it'll be warm?
weather_line3_content: Let me check the forecast for you. It's going to be hot and sunny, 30 degrees.
weather_line4_content: Okay, thanks. I guess I'll pack shorts then.
weather_line5_content: You might want a light jacket for the evenings as the temperature can drop in the evenings.
weather_line6_content: Okay, Will do!
weather_line7_content: Do you have everything you need, or shall we go shopping?
weather_line8_content: I'm okay thanks, my summer wardrobe is full already!
joke_line1_content: Monkey, tell us something funny.
joke_line2_content: *tells a bad joke*
joke_line4_content: Would you like to hear some stand up comedy?
joke_line6_content: I can show you some new material I learned from the latest stand up show I have been watching.
joke_line7_content: Sure!
conversational_line1_content: Hey Monkey, I can't sleep.
conversational_line2_content: Sorry to hear that. Do you want me to play some relaxing music for you?
conversational_line3_content: No thanks. Can we do some guided meditation instead?
conversational_line4_content: Yes of course. I find that so relaxing, I might fall asleep too!
alarm_line1_content: I notice you have a meeting in your calendar early tomorrow.
alarm_line2_content: Yes.
alarm_line3_content: You've run late a few times recently...
alarm_line4_content: Yes!
alarm_line5_content: Would you like me to make sure you are up in time?
alarm_line6_content: I guess so. I hate using an alarm though, jarring me awake in the morning when I'm fast asleep.
alarm_line7_content: I could wake you more gently.
alarm_line9_content: I can set my wake up light function, that mirrors sunrise. And how about some gentle birdsong to wake up to?
alarm_line11_content: Okay. I can see that the meeting is at 8:00 and it takes 30 minutes to get there in traffic. How long do you need to get ready?
alarm_line12_content: Probably about an hour, give me time for a strong coffee!
alarm_line13_content: There is a coffee shop near the building where the meeting is being held.
alarm_line14_content: Okay, could you factor in a stop off there please?
alarm_line15_content: Sure, so I'll make sure you are awake at 7:00.
scenario_open_description: I would use the perfect voice assistant to help me with my shopping, for groceries but also for clothes and other personal items. It could store my favourites so it knew what I liked. It could also be linked to my fridge so it knew what I was needing to stock up on.
open_line1_content: Hey Monkey, can you help with the food shopping please?
open_line2_content: Sure thing! Is it a full shop?
open_line3_content: Yes please.
open_line4_content: Okay, I'll make sure you have all your usuals.
open_line5_content: Thanks. Can you also get some chocolate this time?
open_line6_content: Of course! Need a treat too.
open_line7_content: Thanks Monkey.
open_line8_content: I can see you are running low on butter. Did you want me to add some to the list?
open_line10_content: No problem. Would you prefer to click and collect or did you want me to order a delivery for you?
open_line11_content: Could you order a delivery this time please?
open_line12_content: No problem. Did you want a Saturday morning again?
open_line13_content: After 10:00. I want to be awake!
open_line14_content: Naturally! I can find a slot for 11:30?
open_line16_content: All booked. The shopping comes to £35.00 this week. Are you happy for me to pay?

But you may want to take a light jumper as it will be cold in England upon your return.

open_line2_content: the best way to cook crackling is score the meat and cover in oil and salt
open_line3_content: what next?
open_line4_content: place in preheated oven for 25 minutes at 240 degrees
open_line5_content: okay then what?
open_line6_content: turn down to 190 degrees then cook for 20 minutes per pound of meat plus 20 minutes
open_line7_content: will the crackling be crispy but not too dry?
open_line8_content: baste the joint with the oil a couple of times during cooking and this will give you the perfect crispy but not too dry crackling
open_line10_content: after cooking let the meat stand for 15 minutes before carving and eating

voice_assistant_use: To open certain apps or play music hands free
search_line1_content: Hey Trogdor, I'd like to see the new Ewan McGregor movie today.
search_line2_content: Ok, it is showing at the Vue at 15:00 and 17:30 today, would you like to book tickets?
search_line3_content: Are there any other showings?
search_line4_content: There is another viewing at 20:15 at the Odeon, but it is a further 30 minutes away.
search_line5_content: That's fine, could you please book the tickets.
search_line6_content: Sure, the booking confirmation will be texted to you shortly.
music_line1_content: Hey Trogdor, can you play me some music?
music_line2_content: At this time of day you usually listen to Radio 1, would you like me to play that, or something different?
music_line3_content: Something different please, nothing too lairy.
music_line4_content: No worries, I've curated a playlist based on your favourite acoustic and folk musicians, would you like to listen to that?
iot_line1_content: Trogdor, please start to dim the lights in half an hour, then turn them off completely at 11:30pm.
iot_line2_content: No problem.
volume_line1_content: Hi Trogdor, I'm worried the neighbours can hear the music - how thick is wall?
volume_line2_content: According to the age of your house, the walls are 55cm thick.
volume_line3_content: Can this stop sound?
volume_line4_content: Not very well, would you like me to find simple ways to soundproof your walls?
volume_line5_content: Yes please.
volume_line6_content: I have sent some recommendations to your phone.
weather_line1_content: Trogdor, what will the weather be like in Florence, Italy in two days time?
weather_line2_content: The Met Office predicts brilliant sunshine, with a warm breeze.
weather_line3_content: What clothes would you recommend packing?
weather_line4_content: You won't want to dress like a tourist in Florence, you'll stick out like a sore thumb. I'd recommend a few summer dresses, and comfortable trainers and sandals. The best views of the city are from the gardens above the valley, so make sure to take something you can walk comfortably in.
weather_line5_content: I don't have a summer hat, could you order me one for the trip?
weather_line6_content: I've selected the following hats based on your shopping preferences. They all come with next day delivery - tell me which one you would like and I will order it for you.
weather_line7_content: The big floppy black one please.
weather_line8_content: Done. I'll send shipping updates to your phone.
joke_line1_content: Hey Trogdor, what are some good story or conversation prompts?
joke_line2_content: I have sent a list to your phone. I have also found some well-rated game apps which may help with story prompts. Would you like to see them?
joke_line4_content: Here is the list. Would you like to download any of them?
joke_line5_content: Could you please Download Psyche? That looks quite good.
joke_line6_content: Done.
conversational_line1_content: Trogdor, I can't sleep, could you play something that will help me sleep?
conversational_line2_content: Sure, would you like whale noises, or would you prefer to listen to a podcast?
conversational_line3_content: A podcast please, anything but whale noises..
conversational_line4_content: No problem, here's a podcast of Stephen Fry reading a short story.
alarm_line1_content: Trogdor, I really need to get up early tomorrow. I need to sleep well, but not oversleep.
alarm_line2_content: Ok, I'll set your alarm for 06:00. Radio 1 is set as your alarm, and the snooze function has been switched off. Will you need anything else?
alarm_line3_content: Could you have breakfast delivered from Boston's at 07:00? Chorizo Hash with Poached Eggs please.
alarm_line4_content: I've placed a pre-order for breakfast tomorrow. Anything else?
alarm_line5_content: Could you create a summary of my notes from today, and send it to my phone and laptop please?
alarm_line6_content: Done.
scenario_open_description: I have recently been given a new job, which requires me to dress professionally. My employer has given me a grant to buy a new work wardrobe. I start in a week, however don't have time to go shopping.
open_line1_content: Trogdor, I need a new work wardrobe, can you help?
open_line2_content: No problem, what are you looking for?
open_line3_content: It needs to be within my £300 budget, and needs to be all black and professional, but I want it to fit my personal sense of style.
open_line4_content: Ok no problem. Based on the last 20 clothing items you purchased, I have sent some ideas to your phone. Tap the ones you like and I'll locate similar items and have them shipped by the end of today.
open_line5_content: Could you also order me the Louboutins I was looking at last week, as a treat?
open_line6_content: Sure, they can come out of your rainy day fund. They'll be perfect with outfit number 4.

voice_assistant_use: Playing music, asking questions about the weather, asking general purpose questions (e.g.  How long is the film X? ).
search_line1_content: Hey Adam, I wanna go see Tenet tonight. What times is it on?
search_line2_content: 6pm and 8pm at your local.
search_line3_content: It's over 3 hours with ads, the 8pm showing will end really late. I'd recommend 6pm.
search_line4_content: Cool, can you book me 2 tickets with my two-for-one code?
search_line5_content: Done - they're on your phone now.
search_line6_content: It'll be a busy showing tonight, so I'd recommend leaving at 5:30pm to get good seats.
search_line7_content: Thanks, remind me at 5.
search_line8_content: You got it.
music_line1_content: Hey Adam, play some good cooking music.
music_line2_content: *Begins playing something* How about this?
music_line3_content: Hmm, that's a little too sad, maybe something more upbeat?
music_line4_content: *Changes music* Here's an album by that band you liked from last week, how's this?
music_line5_content: That's perfect, thanks. Maybe turn it up a notch?
music_line6_content: Sure thing.
iot_line1_content: Hey Adam, if you notice me falling asleep, would you mind dimming the lights?
iot_line2_content: Sure - don't stay up too late, though. 20 minutes of reading before bed is optimal.
iot_line3_content: But it's getting really good. Just dim the lights if I fall asleep, otherwise I'll wake up in the night.
iot_line4_content: Don't worry, I won't let that happen.
volume_line1_content: Hey, have you considered that this music may be a little too loud?
volume_line2_content: No, it's fine for me, why do you ask?
volume_line3_content: Well, it's fine for me too, but remember that the Jeffersons next door are a bit sensitive to loud music.
volume_line4_content: You're right, I completely forgot.
volume_line5_content: I'll turn the volume down 18% - that will reduce the sound penetration into next door to a neglible level.
volume_line6_content: Perfect, thanks.
weather_line1_content: Hey Adam, what's the weather going to be like in Venice this weekend?
weather_line2_content: Mostly sunny with patches of rain. Minimum of 20 degrees to a maximum of 28.
weather_line3_content: Patches of rain? Should I take my umbrella or my coat?
weather_line4_content: It's too hot for a coat, bring your travel umbrella. It's already in your blue suitcase.
weather_line5_content: Okay. So are we talking shorts, or lightweight trousers?
weather_line6_content: Even in the rain, shorts will be most comfortable. We're not expecting the temperature to drop below 20.
weather_line7_content: Perfect. Let me know if the forecast changes too much before I leave.
weather_line8_content: Will do.
joke_line1_content: Hey Adam, what's the funniest video in my cloud storage?
joke_line2_content: I'll put one up now, from summer three years ago.
joke_line3_content: My neural network puts this in the top 2% funniest videos in your store.
joke_line4_content: Oh yeah, I remember this. Turn the volume up a bit, and skip forward about 30 seconds.
conversational_line1_content: Having trouble falling asleep?
conversational_line2_content: Yeah, what should I do?
conversational_line3_content: It's a little hot - allow me to adjust the room temperature to 17 degrees, the optimal for good sleep.
conversational_line4_content: I'll also change the hue on the lights, and play some quiet radio. Let me know if it's too loud.
conversational_line5_content: Just don't put on anything too interesting!
conversational_line6_content: Don't worry, it's a podcast about antiques. You'll be sound asleep in no time.
conversational_line7_content: Thanks mate. Could you also open the window a little?
conversational_line8_content: Sure thing - just a tiny bit, so I can still regulate the temperature.
alarm_line1_content: Adam, can you make sure I'm awake by 6am tomorrow? I have that important meeting.
alarm_line2_content: You got it. I'll be as loud as I can without waking the neighbours.
alarm_line3_content: Nice - anything else you think I should do?
alarm_line4_content: Well, it's important you get a good night's sleep. Maybe have some melatonin?
alarm_line5_content: Good idea.
alarm_line6_content: I can't find any, do you know where it is?
alarm_line7_content: In the third drawer down, under your portable charger.
scenario_open_description: I'm cooking dinner, but I don't know long to roast my potatoes for.
open_line1_content: Hey Adam, see these potatoes? How long should these take in the oven?
open_line2_content: Do you want them crispy? Or more on the soft side?
open_line3_content: Crispy.
open_line4_content: I see they're not too big. Let me turn the oven temperature up at bit.
open_line5_content: Once the oven is hot enough, you'll want to cook those for 45 minutes, turning half-way through.
open_line6_content: I'll start the timer once you put them in, and remind you to turn them and take them out.
open_line7_content: Thanks. Also, what kind of oil should I use?
open_line8_content: Something neutral-tasting. Unless you want to try the new peanut oil you bought?
open_line9_content: Actually the peanut oil sounds great, good idea.

voice_assistant_use: Turning the lights on/off, dimming the lights, playing music, checking the weather, telling a joke, checking facts.
search_line1_content: Hey Percy, what films are on at my local cinema tonight?
search_line2_content: The films showing at Showcase cinema, London tonight are A, B & C. Would you like to hear screening times for any of these films?

search_line4_content: The screening times for A are 7pm and 8.30pm. The screening times for B are 6pm and 8pm.
music_line1_content: Hey Percy, play something I'll like.
music_line2_content: Ok, now playing a selection from your personal station.
iot_line1_content: Hey Percy, turn off the lights in 30 minutes.
iot_line2_content: Ok, the lights will be turned off in 30 minutes.
volume_line1_content: Hey Percy, switch music to airpods.
volume_line2_content: Ok, music switched to airpods.
weather_line1_content: Hey Percy, what will the weather be like in Florence in 2 days time?
weather_line2_content: The weather in Florence on September 9th will be sunny, with a temperature of 18 degrees.
joke_line1_content: Hey Percy, let's play a game.
joke_line2_content: Ok, what would you like to play? The most popular games tonight are A, B & C.
joke_line4_content: Ok, let's play. Here are the rules....
conversational_line1_content: Hey Percy, I'm having trouble sleeping.
conversational_line2_content: Ok, I can play some music, or a sleep story for you. Or is there something else that would help?
conversational_line3_content: I'll listen to some music. Play Confidence Man by Matt Pryor please.
conversational_line4_content: Ok, I'll play that for you now. Would you like to set a timer for the music to stop?
conversational_line5_content: Yes, please. Set the timer for 30 minutes.
conversational_line6_content: That's all done. Goodnight.
alarm_line1_content: Hey Percy, I'm worried about oversleeping tomorrow morning.
alarm_line2_content: Ok, let me help. You have an alarm set for 6.00am. Would you like to set a back up alarm?
alarm_line3_content: Yes. Please set a back up for 6.10am and make it 20% louder than the first alarm.
alarm_line4_content: Ok, that's done. Would you also like me to turn on the lights when the alarm goes off?
alarm_line5_content: Yes please.
alarm_line6_content: That's all done.
scenario_open_description: It would be helpful to use the assistant to turn on/off other appliances, e.g. the oven.
open_line1_content: Hey Percy, turn on the oven.
open_line2_content: Ok, what setting would you like to use?
open_line3_content: Fan assisted.
open_line4_content: Ok, what temperature would you like to set the oven to?
open_line5_content: 180 degrees.
open_line6_content: Ok, the oven is set on fan-assisted, at 180 degrees.

weather_line8_content: Thanks Ga I think my list is complete ready for packing.  Set a 7am reminder to read my Rome trip list to me in the morning.
weather_line9_content: I will read the Rome trip list to you at 7am. Have a great trip.

alarm_line5_content: I will play the alarm on repeat from 6am until you give a stop command.

alarm_line7_content: Goodnight Nick. Sweet dreams.

voice_assistant_use: Mostly to play songs. I like to be able to just state what you want to hear and it starts rather than typing in info or getting a record out. Occasionally I will ask a question but it is rarer, but only because I love to listen to music a lot more.
search_line1_content: Charlie, I want to go and see a film at my local cinema this coming Sunday afternoon can you tell me what films are on please?
search_line2_content: The local cinema is currently showing these films at the moment (continues to list them all)
search_line3_content: Charlie, I want to go and watch the last one that you mentioned, what time is that one showing please?
search_line4_content: That film is being shown at 13.00, 15.30, and 18.00 on Sunday.
search_line5_content: Charlie, what is the admission price?
search_line6_content: The film will cost you £7.50 to see. Do you want me to book tickets for you?
search_line7_content: Charlie, is there a quiet time best to go?
search_line8_content: The cinema typically gets quieter from 16.00 hrs on a Sunday. Do you want me to book tickets for you?
search_line9_content: Charlie, not yet, I'll check if my partner can make it first.
music_line1_content: Charlie, i am cooking a dinner. How long does it take to cook a chicken?
music_line2_content: Cook a regular sized chicken for 90 mins at 200 degrees.
music_line3_content: Charlie, can you remind me in 90 minutes to take out my chicken please?
music_line4_content: I will remind you.
music_line5_content: Charlie, and please remind me in 45 minutes to put the potatoes in.
music_line6_content: I will remind you.
music_line7_content: Charlie, and please remind me in an hour to put the vegetables on.
music_line8_content: I will remind you.
music_line9_content: Charlie, will you please play some They Might Be Giants songs please?
music_line10_content: Playing songs by They Might Be Giants.
iot_line1_content: Charlie, I am in bed now and ready to read a book.
iot_line2_content: I shall continue to use your preferred instruction and make sure that the lights are automatically turned off after half an hour unless you tell me otherwise.
iot_line3_content: Charlie, make it 45 minutes on this occasion as I'm not so tired and I am off work tomorrow.
iot_line4_content: Your instruction will be carried out. Enjoy your book.
volume_line1_content: Charlie, can you ensure that the music I am playing is no louder than what is suitable for a home environment please?
volume_line2_content: Levels have been set for a home domestic environment so that you can hear comfortably and yet any neighbours should not hear it.
weather_line1_content: Good morning, this is Charlie. I know that you are away in Italy in 2 days time so here is another brief weather forecast. Northern Italy will be around 20 degrees on arrival with a 20% chance of some rain. In the next week temperatures are expected to rise to 24 degrees. In Southern Italy it will be around 24 degrees when you arrive with a 5% chance of rain and temperatures are expected to rise to 28 degrees during the week. Is there any other information that you would like to know?
weather_line2_content: Charlie, could you tell me specifically what the temperature expected in Rome will be for the week I am there please?
weather_line3_content: When you arrive in Rome it will be 22 degrees and by the end of the week 26 degrees are expected, with just a 10% chance of rainfall overall, midweek seeing the biggest chance of rain.
weather_line4_content: Charlie, what time is sunrise and sunset in Rome at the moment?
weather_line5_content: Sunrise in Rome is 06.06 and sunset is 20.22
joke_line1_content: Charlie, please tell me and my team mates some funny stories about football please.
joke_line2_content: Here are a selection of funny stories about football.
conversational_line1_content: Charlie, I am having trouble falling asleep, what do you recommend please?
conversational_line2_content: Make sure the room temperature is suitable, open a window if you feel warm. I could play some soothing music if you would like me to?
conversational_line3_content: Charlie, yes, please play some relaxing music.
conversational_line4_content: I will play 20 minutes of relaxing music which will get gradually quieter and will end automatically.
alarm_line1_content: Charlie, please wake me up at 6am
alarm_line2_content: Would you like to wake to an alarm or some music?
alarm_line3_content: Some music please, nothing specific though.
alarm_line4_content: Should I make it louder and louder so that you don't fall back to sleep?
alarm_line5_content: Yes please, maybe intersperse it with some kind of siren every 15 minutes so that I am definitely up!
alarm_line6_content: Instructions saved and ready to use.
scenario_open_description: We all need a bit of help from time to time and advice, and yet sometimes there is nobody to talk to. The option to ask an opinion would be a great thing to have at anybody's disposal.
open_line1_content: Charlie, i'm feeling a bit anxious today.
open_line2_content: Is there a particular reason for your anxiety today?
open_line3_content: Charlie, I've got to give a speech today at a meeting in front of many others and I'm not used to it.
open_line4_content: Public speaking in front of a crowd can be difficult but there are many ways to help. Practice as though speaking in front of everyone. Take your time. Have the notes with you or if you prefer not to then have some budget points. Don't try to be to funny. Don't go on too long. Involve others, break up the speech and add a chance for reply. Do you think these tips may help?
open_line5_content: Charlie, I have been practicing but still feel nervous.
open_line6_content: It is understandable to feel nervous. Nobody will even realise if you try and take control over the situation.
open_line7_content: Charlie, is it best I say I'm nervous?
open_line8_content: I think it would be if you feel you can not get through the meeting without thinking it better to point it out. Remember though, that there will be others who are just as nervous and not keen to get up and speak out.

voice_assistant_use: When driving, if you want to find a destination or call someone. To stream music from Spotify occasionally. To roll virtual dice in order to make a random decision. To have fun with, with the kids, by asking random and funny questions. We have also used them to help translate when on holiday in France
search_line1_content: Hi Shirley, I want to go to the cinema to see Tenet. What times is it showing tonight?
search_line2_content: Are you going to your local cinema again?
search_line3_content: I want to, yes.
search_line4_content: There's a showing at 1830 and another at 2030 tonight. Does that help?
search_line5_content: That's great, 2030 will be perfect.
search_line6_content: I can book it, if you'd like.
search_line7_content: Sure. There are two of us; the back row, please.
search_line8_content: Done, the booking confirmation email has been sent to you.
music_line1_content: Hey Shirley, my hands are dirty marinating the chicken for dinner tonight, can you put some music on?
music_line2_content: Sure, what would you like to listen to?
music_line4_content: Smooth and relaxing huh. How about some Sade?
music_line5_content: Sounds perfect, can't beat a bit of Smooth Operator
music_line6_content: I agree, very melodic.
iot_line1_content: Hi Sam, the usual bedtime reading again?
iot_line2_content: Yes, can't wait to finish my book.
iot_line3_content: Would you like me to read it to you tonight?
iot_line4_content: Sounds great, why not.
iot_line6_content: Yes.
iot_line7_content: Ok. What page are you on?
iot_line8_content: 323, the start of the new chapter.
iot_line9_content: As a side note, you often fall asleep with the light on. Would you like me to turn it off whilst you're sleeping?
volume_line1_content: Sam, your music is over 70 decibels. Knowing your neighbors, as we do, they might not be happy.
volume_line2_content: You're probably right, Shirley. Ok, turn the volume down to something they might find acceptable.
volume_line3_content: How about this? 55 decibels, they should be ok with this level.
volume_line4_content: Yeah, that's fine, bloody neighbors.
volume_line5_content: Would you like me to set 55 as a general control, that you can override?
volume_line6_content: Hmmm ok, better to be a good citizen and not be selfish, i guess.
weather_line1_content: Hey Shirley, what is the weather like in Italy, in Venice, over the next few days?
weather_line2_content: Most days are cloudy with the occasional sunny spell.
weather_line3_content: Any rain?
weather_line4_content: Nothing predicted in Venice over the next 7 days.
weather_line6_content: Temperatures range from 12 degrees Celsius to 24 degrees.
joke_line1_content: Shirley, can you help us out here; i'm with friends chilling and we've run out of funny stories. Do you have any funny stories you can tell us?
joke_line2_content: Well, Sam, there was a funny story in the news about a man who went swimming in the ocean in Spain and lost his swim trunks.
joke_line4_content: The lifeguards realized a swimmer was possibly missing when they saw the swim trunks floating aimlessly in the sea.
joke_line5_content: Haha, what size trunks were they?
joke_line6_content: The article didn't say. I've just completed a scan of the local Spanish news and they don't say either, haha.
joke_line7_content: Haha. What happened to the man? Was he found?
joke_line8_content: Yes, by the lifeguards. The man was lucky they were so vigilant.
joke_line9_content: Indeed.
conversational_line1_content: Hey, Sam, I've noticed you're having trouble falling asleep. Is there anything I can do?
conversational_line2_content: I don't know. Give me some sleeping pills.
conversational_line3_content: We don't have any in the house. How about if i play some gentle music?
conversational_line4_content: Ok, give it a try.
conversational_line5_content: How about this, the soothing sounds of the ocean waves on the beach?
conversational_line6_content: Can't only help. Thanks, Shirley.
alarm_line1_content: Sam, I've noticed you have a important meeting scheduled in your diary early tomorrow morning.
alarm_line2_content: I do, yes.
alarm_line3_content: Would you like me to set your alarm so you don't oversleep?
alarm_line4_content: Ok
alarm_line5_content: What time would you like it set for?
alarm_line6_content: 0630 should be fine.
alarm_line7_content: That's done for you. If you don't wake up i will play it again 5 minutes later.
scenario_open_description: To help choose color coordinating clothes to wear out.
open_line1_content: Shirley, I'm going out and I'd like to wear this new top i bought. What color trousers would you recommend i wear with it?
open_line2_content: According too color theory, neutral colors, like white, black, beige and grey, and light pastel colors, like light blue, pale pink, light green, go well with that color top, bearing in mind your hair and skin color.
open_line3_content: Thank you, Shirley, I'll choose these trousers then.
open_line4_content: No problem

search_line1_content: Hey Jaine, could you tell me the film times for 2D showings of Tenet at the cinema in town?

music_line4_content: Ok, i'll play a selection of classical scores.

weather_line2_content: The weather in Italy is sunny for the next two days although it gets cooler in the evenings.
weather_line3_content: Thanks Jaine, i'd better pack accordingly.

joke_line4_content: Ok, i'll tell some stories about politicians.

conversational_line2_content: Would you prefer soothing music or white noise?
conversational_line3_content: Soothing music please Jaine.
alarm_line1_content: Hey Jaine, I have an important meeting tomorrow and need to get up earlier than normal.
alarm_line2_content: Would you like me to set an alarm for you?
alarm_line3_content: Yes please, could you set it for 6 am and then remind me again at 6:15 am?
alarm_line4_content: Confirmed, alarm has been set for 6 am tomorrow.

open_line6_content: Order confirmed, due for delivery in three days.
open_line7_content: Thanks Jaine.

alarm_line4_content: Ok, I'll wake you up gently with Radio X at 6am.

voice_assistant_use: To search the internet hands free.
search_line1_content: Betsy
search_line2_content: Yes
search_line3_content: Can you tell me what's showing at the local cinema tonight please?
search_line4_content: There are many films, can you tell me an exact time or genre so I can provide you with a selection of options?
search_line5_content: I'm thinking between 7-8pm this evening, either an action film or a horror movie
search_line6_content: Ok, there are two films showing that time with availability, would you like to see both trailers?
search_line7_content: Yes please
search_line8_content: Ok based on what you've found I'd like to see the horror movie
search_line9_content: Ok that is at 8pm, how many tickets would you like?
search_line11_content: Ok that is all booked and an email comfirmation will be in your email inbox shortly
search_line13_content: No problem I'm here to help
music_line1_content: Betsy how about some music
music_line2_content: Good idea, what kind of music would you like?
music_line3_content: Good question, what about some 80's music
music_line4_content: Excellent choice, would you like me to go through your music library or create a playlist
music_line5_content: Could you create a playlist and if I don't like some of the songs I'll just ask you to skip a track
music_line6_content: Ok, I'll create a playlist based on 80's music which will include your top 20 most played songs
music_line8_content: No problem, I'm here to help
iot_line1_content: The lights are still on and it's past midnight, I will turn the lights off in 1 minute if there is no response
volume_line1_content: Hello, the music is quite loud for this time of night, shall I turn it down a little as the neighbours may complain?
volume_line2_content: Yes Betsy, we wouldn't want them to call the police
volume_line3_content: No, we would not, especially after they complained last time
volume_line4_content: True, please turn down the music by 25%
volume_line5_content: I shall, is that volume ok?
volume_line6_content: Yes, thanks Betsy
volume_line7_content: No problem, I'm here to help
weather_line1_content: Betsy, you know I'm going to Italy for a few days?
weather_line2_content: Yes I am very excited for you, there is lots to do and see in Italy
weather_line3_content: I need to pack, can you tell me what the weather will be please?
weather_line4_content: The weather will be mild but there is rain expected on the first day
weather_line5_content: Do you think packing just a rain jacket will be sufficient?
weather_line6_content: I would recommend packing a rain jacket and an umbrella and some sweaters, but a winter coat will not be necessary
weather_line7_content: Ok that's great, I'll do that
joke_line1_content: Betsy, are you able to bring up any funny stories on the internet for us to watch or listen to?
joke_line2_content: When you say funny, what kind of humour do you mean?
joke_line3_content: A story with a punch line
joke_line4_content: Ok, I have found several stories
joke_line5_content: Are there any funny stories which include a group of people?
joke_line6_content: Yes there are stories involving families, friends, the office environment, is there a particular area you'd prefer?
joke_line7_content: Yes please choose the stories including friends, but no bad language please
joke_line8_content: Ok, I have selected 3 stories with no bad language, including a group of friends which are no longer than 5 minutes long, is that ok?
joke_line9_content: Perfect, turn up your volume and please tell the first funny story
conversational_line1_content: Betsy, it's midnight and I can't sleep
conversational_line2_content: I'm sorry to hear that, sleep is very important. Would you like me to find some soothing music?
conversational_line3_content: Yes, can you find some natural sounds rather than music though?
conversational_line4_content: I have found a playlist which will play the sound of raindrops for 30 minutes, would you like me to put it on?
conversational_line6_content: Ok, I shall play this for 30 minutes, please let me know if you'd like anything else
conversational_line7_content: No, 30 minutes of rain drops should send me to sleep, thanks Betsy
conversational_line8_content: No problem, I'm here to help
alarm_line1_content: Betsy, if you look at my diary you will see that I have an important meeting early tomorrow
alarm_line2_content: I'll check your diary, yes you have a meeting with Claire at 7.30am, shall I set a reminder?
alarm_line3_content: Could you set an alarm instead please?
alarm_line4_content: What kind of alarm would you like? A wake up call?
alarm_line5_content: Yes, I'd like a wake up call at 6am
alarm_line6_content: I have set your alarm for 6am
alarm_line7_content: Actually, you know I tend to oversleep, can you get a couple of alarms for me?
alarm_line8_content: I can set your original alarm for 6am and then in 10 min internals is that ok?
alarm_line10_content: Great, that has now been set and when you wake up I can cancel the 10 min intervals
scenario_open_description: I think the sky is the limit in terms of how an assistant would help you. They could book tickets, they can look at your diary, they can remind you of important milestones and birthdays etc.     The example I am going to give is to remember birth dates
open_line1_content: You have a family birthday coming up this month, would you like me to give you more detail?
open_line2_content: Yes please
open_line3_content: Your mother is turning 50 on 10th June
open_line4_content: Oh yeah I had forgotten
open_line5_content: As your mother is turning 50 would you like to send her anything different to last year?
open_line6_content: What did I do last year?
open_line7_content: My records show that you got her a card and some flowers
open_line8_content: I'd better do better than that, what do you suggest
open_line9_content: I think a personalised gift would be nice
open_line10_content: Like?
open_line11_content: You took a nice family photograph on her last birthday, how about putting that picture onto a canvas?
open_line12_content: Excellent idea, can you look at options please
open_line13_content: Of course, I have found a company who can create and deliver the canvas in a 20in x 20in format, would that work?
open_line15_content: If we ordered it today, she would receive it 3 days before her birthday and it will cost £25 including delivery
open_line16_content: Great lets do that and then I'll send a card as well, can you remind me to send the card 2 days before
open_line17_content: I have set that reminder for you. Please look at your inbox for more details on the canvas
open_line19_content: No problem I'm here to help

iot_line7_content: Yes that's light 7

volume_line4_content: Ok

weather_line3_content: Yes please.
weather_line4_content: The weather for today, tomorrow, .......... is.

joke_line4_content: Any kind

joke_line7_content: Music of the 80s please
joke_line8_content: Ok

alarm_line3_content: Yes

alarm_line5_content: No problem. Have you filled the kettle with water?

voice_assistant_use: Set timers/ alarms/ reminders  Play/control music  Check weather  Call contact on my phone
search_line1_content: Hey Bixby, what movies are currently showing in the cinema?

search_line3_content: Please list the show times for Film 2
search_line4_content: Film 2 will air today twice at 15:00 and 17:50
search_line5_content: Thank you bixby

music_line2_content: Which device would you like me to use to play the music?
music_line3_content: Use the TV in the kitchen
music_line4_content: Streaming music to your TV, enjoy!

iot_line2_content: I will turn off the lights in 30 minutes, anything else you would like me to do?

iot_line4_content: Yes that can be done, anything else?
iot_line5_content: No that will be all, thank you.

volume_line2_content: The music is currently playing at 80% max volume, would you like me to adjust the volume?

volume_line6_content: I will decrease the volume in half an hour by 30%
volume_line7_content: Thank you.

weather_line2_content: The weather in Italy will be mostly sunny all week with average temperatures reaching 30c, no rain is forcasted for the upcoming week.

alarm_line6_content: Snooze disabled, will that be all?

search_line6_content: Yes sir.
