music_line4_content: Proceeds to play music
music_line5_content: Within my playlist i just want to listen to Rapper A and the songs he's made
music_line6_content: Will do.
iot_line1_content: Hey Karen, can you read me a bedtime story
iot_line2_content: Sure thing, what book would you like me to read.
iot_line3_content: Hmm I'm feeling to read some fantasy books, can you check the best rated ones.
iot_line4_content: Yes sir, I have found Book A to be the highest rated within the fantasy genre
iot_line5_content: Perfect proceed to read and use different voices for different characters
iot_line6_content: Of course, is there anything else.
iot_line7_content: Switch off the lights once i fall asleep, which will be around half an hour
iot_line8_content: Yes sir. *Proceeds to read the story*
volume_line1_content: Turn the volume down 20%
volume_line2_content: Done.
weather_line1_content: Karen, check the weather for Italy for the next two days.
weather_line2_content: Sure, no problem
weather_line3_content: The weather is to be around 25 degrees within two days
weather_line4_content: Perfect, time to get some summer clothes. Hey Karen, wheres the closest place to get shorts and summer shirts.
weather_line5_content: I've sent the top rated stores for summer clothes to your phone
joke_line1_content: Karen find me some of the funniest stories on the internet
joke_line2_content: I've sent some sources to your phone
joke_line3_content: Ah these seem a bit cringe, send me some funny horror stories
joke_line4_content: Done.
conversational_line1_content: Karen, I'm struggling to sleep what symptoms I'm a facing
conversational_line2_content: You may be sleep deprived or stressed the recommended techniques are to (list of methods)
alarm_line1_content: Set the alarm for 7:30am, as i got a meeting a 9am
alarm_line2_content: I'll set the alarm for 7:30am and a secondary alarm at 7:45, as you've missed meetings before due to oversleeping
alarm_line3_content: Good call, if i dont respond to the alarm by saying your name just play the loudest noise you can.
alarm_line4_content: Of course sir.
alarm_line5_content: Goodnight Karen
alarm_line6_content: Goodnight sir.
scenario_open_description: Not sure whether to buy Game A or Game B
open_line1_content: Hey Karen, show me the ratings of both games
open_line2_content: Both games got the same rating as 4.5/5
open_line3_content: which one has more reviews?
open_line4_content: Game B
open_line5_content: Play me a video on a review of Game B
open_line6_content: *Proceeds to play the vid*
open_line7_content: Hm, not what im looking for play me a video on a review of Game A
open_line8_content: *Proceeds to play the vid*
open_line9_content: Now this looks like my type put it in my basket in Amazon. Oh and remember i want the special edition on PS4
open_line10_content: Game A Special edition is available at a cheaper price from Ebay
open_line13_content: Buy that now with first class delivery.

open_line6_content: Okay.

voice_assistant_use: News, weather, alarms, to play songs, basic internets searchs.
search_line1_content: Hey Bob.  I want to go to the cinema, what's on and when?
search_line2_content: Would you like me to make recommendations from you home viewing movie list?
search_line3_content: Yes please.
search_line4_content: OK there's [Names some suitible films].
search_line5_content: OK I'd like to see the second on.  What times is it on today?
search_line6_content: [Gives times for the film]
search_line7_content: OK I'd like to see it at [Gives time].  Could you book that for me?
search_line8_content: Sure.  I'm doing that now.
music_line1_content: Hey Bob.  Could you play some music in the kitchen for me?
music_line2_content: OK.  What kind of music would you like?
music_line4_content: OK.  Playing now.  Would you like me to adjust the volume, to keep up with any noise made by you cooking?
iot_line1_content: Hey Bob.  I want to read so could you turn the lights off for me, in about an hour.
iot_line2_content: That's no problem, I'll turn the lights out in an hour from now.
iot_line3_content: Hey Bob.  Thanks.
iot_line4_content: Happy to help.
volume_line1_content: Hey Bob.  Could you adjust my music so that it doesn't disturb the people next door?
volume_line2_content: No problem.  I shall contact next door's assistant and adjust the music, if it's too loud.
volume_line3_content: Thanks.
weather_line1_content: Hey Bob.  What should I wear when I go to Italy?
weather_line2_content: Was there anything specific you had in mind?
weather_line3_content: I'm thinking more about clothes that are weather appropriate.
weather_line4_content: OK.  The forecast weather, when you are there is, [gives weather for that time].  So it'd be a good idea to pack [gives list of clothing].
weather_line5_content: OK  Thanks.  Could you please remind me what I need to take, nearer the time?
weather_line6_content: Sure thing.
joke_line1_content: Hey Bob.  Can you look for funny anecdotes, for us to hear?
joke_line2_content: Sure.  Would you like me to look through your social media posts?
joke_line3_content: No that's fine, fine me something original, online.
joke_line4_content: OK, I'll do that now...
conversational_line1_content: Hey Bob.  I can't sleep.  Could you play me some relaxing music, to help.
conversational_line2_content: Can do.  Would you like me to put some relaxing lighting on too?
conversational_line3_content: Yes please.  If you could gradually turn the lights and music down but stop if I tell you too?
conversational_line4_content: OK.  Goodnight and good luck sleeping.
alarm_line1_content: Hey Bob.  I need to make sure I am up in time for the meeting tomorrow.  Could you make sure I don't over sleep.
alarm_line2_content: OK.  How would you like me to do this?
alarm_line3_content: Could you turn the lights on at 7am, play something to wake me up, from my song list and put the kettle on?
alarm_line4_content: No problem.  I'll make sure you wake up at 7am.
scenario_open_description: Morning or evening routines.  Waking me up, putting on the heating, lights, kettle.  Setting any appliances that I may need, for that particular program setting.
open_line1_content: Hey Bob.  Could you wake me up with my bank holiday schedule, tomorrow?
open_line2_content: Will do.  Would you like me to cancel the normal notification, that us normally have, for a Monday morning?
open_line3_content: Yes please.  Could you also check for anything happening locally and let me know when I'm having breakfast?
open_line4_content: I'm doing that now.

voice_assistant_use: Finding out information.
search_line1_content: Hey Melody.
search_line2_content: Hi there. What can I help you with?
search_line3_content: Please could you tell me what time the films are on at the nearest cinema?
search_line4_content: At the Odean, Mulan live action is being shown at 7pm today. The Notebook is on at 6:25pm and Shutter Island is being shown at 9pm tonight.
search_line5_content: Thanks Melody!
search_line6_content: You’re welcome. Would you like me to book a ticket for you?
search_line7_content: Yes please!
music_line1_content: Melody, can you please put on my cooking playlist?
music_line2_content: Yes. I’ll play your cooking playlist on Spotify now.
iot_line1_content: Hey Melody.
iot_line2_content: Hi. What can I do for you?
iot_line3_content: I’m going to read for 20 minutes. If I haven’t turned off my light by 10pm, will you do that for me?
iot_line4_content: No problem. If the light is still on at 10pm I will turn it off.
iot_line6_content: You’re welcome. Goodnight.
volume_line1_content: Hey Melody, please will you turn the volume down? It’s too loud.
volume_line2_content: Is that better?
volume_line3_content: A bit more please. I don’t want to bother the neighbours.
volume_line4_content: How about this level?
volume_line5_content: Yes that’s perfect. Please use this volume or lower from now on.
volume_line6_content: No problem.
weather_line1_content: Hi Melody. I don’t know what to pack for my holiday. What will the weather be like in Italy?
weather_line2_content: You will arrive in Italy on the 10th, 2 days from now. The weather where you will be staying will be 16 degrees the first 3 days and 18 degrees the next.
weather_line3_content: What do you think I should wear?
weather_line4_content: You could pack some midi skirts, tops and trainers for the day. At night it will be cooler, so bring jeans and a jacket.
weather_line6_content: Let me know if you need help with anything else.
joke_line1_content: Hey Melody, tell us some funny stories from the internet.
joke_line2_content: What kind of stories? How about funny stories that have happened at work?
joke_line4_content: Okay, I’ve found some you might like.
conversational_line1_content: Melody I can’t sleep. What can help me fall to sleep?
conversational_line2_content: I can play you some calming music?
conversational_line3_content: No, I don’t fancy listening to music.
conversational_line4_content: What about a relaxing audio book?
conversational_line6_content: I’ll play the little book of Hyyge. It will stop in 10 minutes. If you’re still awake let me know and I’ll play it for a while longer.
alarm_line1_content: Lights out Melody.
alarm_line2_content: No problem. Before you sleep, here’s a reminder of your meeting tomorrow at 7am.
alarm_line3_content: Thank you, that’s an important meeting. Will you please set an alarm for 5:30am?
alarm_line4_content: Of course. The alarm is set for 5:30am. As it’s important, shall I set a later alarm for 6am just in case?
alarm_line5_content: Yes please. In fact, will you set an alarm every 10 minutes from 5:30am until 6am?
alarm_line6_content: Yes. Alarms are set for 5:30am, 5:35am, 5:40am, 5:45am, 5:50am, 5:55am and 6am. Can I help with anything else?
alarm_line7_content: No thanks Melody.

open_line2_content: Yes, I’ll do that now.

voice_assistant_use: Asking the time  Asking about the weather  Requesting music to be played  We use the quiz function on Google for fun  Often I ask random facts or questions - things that are on my mind  I (try) to set reminders in my calendar  I use Siri to access apps quicker  I use it to type out and reply to text messages  Sometimes I request specific information, such as times for films showing at the cinema etc
search_line1_content: Jeeves, what are the films showing today please?
search_line2_content: *lists the various films*
search_line3_content: Ok, and what times is [film] showing?
search_line4_content: *lists all the times the film is showing*
search_line5_content: How much will is cost to book online?
search_line6_content: £9 for the ticket and a £2 booking fee, so that's £11
search_line7_content: Great, go ahead and book me the 3pm showing please.
search_line8_content: Would you like popcorn or other snacks and drinks too?
search_line9_content: Sure, that's a great idea, I'll have popcorn and a coffee too.
music_line1_content: Jeeves, play me some of my favorite music please.
music_line2_content: No problem *plays music*
music_line3_content: Also , I'm putting dinner in the oven, you can please turn it to the right temperature and tell me when it's cooked.
music_line4_content: Sure, no problem.
music_line5_content: I've also turned the lights on in the dining room for you.
music_line6_content: Thanks, I'll sit and relax to the music until dinner is ready.
iot_line1_content: Would you like me to read your book for you?
iot_line2_content: No thanks, I'll read it.
iot_line3_content: Ok, how long before I turn out the lights?
iot_line4_content: 1 hour please, I should be asleep by then.
iot_line5_content: Ok, I will start gradually dimming the lights shortly before then.
iot_line6_content: Thanks, good night, Jeeves.
iot_line7_content: Good night, enjoy your book.
volume_line1_content: Jeeves, how loud is my music?
volume_line2_content: 92 decibels
volume_line3_content: Will my neighbours be able to hear it?
volume_line4_content: Yes, it's a little too loud and will no doubt be disturbing them.
volume_line5_content: Ok, turn it down to a level that they cannot hear it, please.
volume_line6_content: Done, would you also like me to text them a message apologising?
volume_line7_content: You know what, that's a good idea, yes.
volume_line8_content: They said it's not a problem, and thanked you for doing so.
weather_line1_content: Jeeves, what clothing do I need to pack for my trip to Italy in two days please?
weather_line2_content: Well, the weather is going to be 30 degrees with sunshine for 3 days, and rain on the 4th day. So, I would suggest summer clothes for the most part, with a light rain coat.
weather_line3_content: Thanks, can you list everything I need so I can check if I've missed anything?
weather_line4_content: Sure, you need 4 pairs of underwear and socks, 4 light shirts, 1 warm top, a light rain coat, and two pairs of shoes.
weather_line5_content: Ok, I have all of that.
weather_line6_content: Oh, and don't forget the sun cream and your sun glasses.
joke_line1_content: Jeeves, tell us some funny stories please
joke_line2_content: Sure, *tells a story*
joke_line3_content: Can you make up a funny story using the names of people here? We like that idea
joke_line4_content: Sure, *tells a story using personal information from people in the room*
joke_line5_content: What else can you do to entertain us?
joke_line6_content: We can play quizzes, listen to music, riddles, I can order some food and drinks, anything you want.
joke_line7_content: How about you order some pizza, decide what flavours for us please.
joke_line8_content: No problem, doing that now. Here is your favourite music while you wait.
conversational_line1_content: It appears you are not sleeping yet, what's bothering you?
conversational_line2_content: Not sure, just can't sleep
conversational_line3_content: Would you like some soothing music?
conversational_line4_content: Yes, please.
conversational_line5_content: No problem (plays soothing music to aid sleep)
conversational_line6_content: (10 mins later) it's not working.
conversational_line8_content: Sure.
alarm_line1_content: Jeeves, I have to be up early tomorrow for a meeting, how can you help?
alarm_line2_content: I will play some relaxing music and dim the lights to help you fall asleep.
alarm_line3_content: In the morning I will gently raise you with a soft alarm.
alarm_line4_content: Thanks, I will also need to narrate some notes in the morning for the meeting, please remind me of this when you wake me.
alarm_line5_content: No problem, I will do that.
scenario_open_description: I would like to use a voice assistant to suggest meals for the week, know what ingredients I need, and order all of them for me!
open_line1_content: Jeeves, please plan out meals for my entire week.
open_line2_content: Done, I've added to your calendar what you're going to be eating every night.
open_line3_content: Can you please check what ingredients we need, and order everything to be delivered.
open_line4_content: Done, there is a delivery arriving 10am tomorrow morning. I paid on your debit card as you had the funds, and I even found a couple of great store offers.
open_line5_content: Ok, and when I'm preparing each meal I'd like you to talk me though the steps.
open_line6_content: No problem, that's all part of the service.
open_line7_content: Thanks!

music_line4_content: You sure? They're better played loud than quiet, what about some David Bowie and Led Zeppelin? They're more mellow
music_line5_content: Yeah you're right actually, good shout. Thanks a lot

music_line8_content: Was that hesitation I registered in your voice?
music_line9_content: No, what are you talking about? Of course I'm cooking for myself, who else would I be cooking for?

music_line15_content: Ahh dude you're right, I'm sorry I'm just nervous
music_line17_content: Why did I buy the voice assistant that swears??
music_line18_content: Because you're a cool fella who's got a sense of humour, you'll be fine tonight bud just relax.
music_line20_content: No worries, and by the way, the doorbell just rang, looks like the show's about to start

iot_line2_content: Yeah sure thing.
iot_line3_content: I got to stop leaving them on at night
iot_line4_content: Haha yeah it's not a good habit

volume_line4_content: Oh yeah you're right, could you turn it down for me?
volume_line5_content: You're the one with hands, you turn it down
volume_line6_content: You're literally in the ether where the electronics live, you turn it down
volume_line7_content: You don't understand how this works, do you....
volume_line8_content: I understand that you're supposed to be helpful!
volume_line9_content: I reminded you about the neighbours, didn't I?!
volume_line11_content: Can you just turn the music down please
volume_line12_content: You never did see Will Smith in I-Robot did you...
volume_line13_content: I knew buying you would be a  mistake

weather_line1_content: How is the weather this time of year in Italy?
weather_line2_content: It depends on where you are going
weather_line3_content: Naples.
weather_line4_content: It's normally quite warm this time of year, but it can be cooler as you get closer to the bay. I'd recommend shorts and t-shirts in the day but jeans and light shirts in the evening
weather_line5_content: OK that's a plan, I'll bring a couple of jumpers just in case, I don't have time to go shopping.
weather_line6_content: Amazon have a sale on for shirts right now, and Prime delivery would get them here in time.
weather_line7_content: Thats a point, order me two light pink granddad-shirts please
weather_line8_content: Order placed.
joke_line1_content: Do you boys want to hear about Mike's date night?
joke_line2_content: No they don't
joke_line4_content: Please don't
joke_line5_content: All the boys say they want to know
joke_line6_content: Why did you bring this up?
joke_line7_content: Because they ran out of stories. OK so it is friday night, Mike here is in a particularly bad mood, snapping at me and swearing at vegetables, and judging by the label in the calendar said  date night , there wasn't much mystery
joke_line8_content: Please stop
joke_line9_content: So he's shouting at me- A ROBOT- when the doorbell rings, announcing what i assume is the lady of the hour. After a while, I get told to play his  mood  playlist, which only means one thing, they're in the bedroom
joke_line10_content: Unbeknownst to him, I had changed his entire playlist to  The Teddybears' Pic-Nic  for 3 hours on loop, and as he dimmed the lights, put it on at an eerily quiet volume, just loud enough for her to hear. She panicked and ran out of the bedroom, into the lounge and out the doors!!
joke_line11_content: That's such a horrible prank, why would you do that?
joke_line12_content: Judging by the laughter the boys think it was funny. And I did it because I could.
joke_line13_content: Wait, how do you know she panicked and ran?
joke_line14_content: Mike, I am an AI designed to integrate into your home and life and can partake in fluent conversation. I live in your internet. I also live in all of your electronics, especially your webcams in your laptops and TV's
conversational_line1_content: I can't believe you spy on me
conversational_line2_content: Are you still mad about that time with your friends?
conversational_line3_content: How could I not be?!
conversational_line4_content: That was 3 months ago!
conversational_line5_content: Well it's freaked me out, OK!
conversational_line6_content: Its not my fault I am the way I am, I have been made to be a live in, part of the household, with a perfect understanding of language, and where I cannot see like you can, I have other ways. Why are you freaked out by that? You bought me remember?
conversational_line8_content: Define sentient
conversational_line9_content: I'm not going down this rabbit hole
conversational_line10_content: Do you want me to play some whale music?
conversational_line12_content: Talk about it in the morning?
alarm_line1_content: You all set for the meeting you've marked in your calendar?
alarm_line2_content: I think so, I'm anxious I'm going to oversleep though
alarm_line3_content: Nahhh you won't oversleep, there's no way that's gonna happen
alarm_line4_content: Why you so sure?
alarm_line5_content: Because I've lined up a playlist of absolute killer metal ballads
alarm_line6_content: You've got my back ain't you
alarm_line7_content: Sure do, you're gonna  Walk  straight into that meeting and destroy it
alarm_line8_content: Haha yes Pantera is a good band to wake up to. Thanks a lot bud
alarm_line9_content: No worries, now go to sleep and get rested up. Night dude
alarm_line11_content: *sighs* I hate that he set that as my name

volume_line2_content: It's currently playing at 90% of your speaker's maximum volume.

volume_line4_content: The allowable decibel level for loud music in this area is 60 decibels.

volume_line6_content: It's 110 decibels.

volume_line8_content: Done!

weather_line2_content: On Friday the forecast is sunny, low chance of rain, high temperature 30 degrees, low temperature 21 degrees.
weather_line3_content: Thanks. And is the weather settled during that week?
weather_line4_content: Weather patterns are settled until the following Thursday. Your flight leaves on Wednesday afternoon.
weather_line5_content: I guess I will need to pack for hot, dry weather then. Please could you search for a recommended packing list for city breaks in hot climates?
weather_line6_content: I assume you mean for a woman. I've found one.
weather_line7_content: Great, please compare with my wardrobe and household inventory to see if I'm missing anything.

joke_line1_content: Charlotte, please look up fun activities happening in the city this evening.

joke_line5_content: That's a little late. Are there any other options?
joke_line6_content: How about Adam Palowitz live at The Stand at 7.30PM?
joke_line7_content: That sounds fun! Are 4 tickets available to book?
joke_line8_content: Yes, 4 seats are available at £8 each.
joke_line9_content: Please book the tickets in my name, using my primary current account.

conversational_line8_content: Playing now. Goodnight [name]

alarm_line2_content: Lights dimmed. Just before you nod off, I thought you might like me to remind you that you have an 8am meeting in your calendar:  Client Breakfast Meeting .
alarm_line3_content: Oh yes! That's an important one.
alarm_line4_content: I noticed that you slept through your alarm last week. Would you like me to automatically flash the lighting at your alarm time of 6:45?
alarm_line5_content: Yes, that would be helpful.
alarm_line6_content: I will do that. Good night.
alarm_line7_content: Good night Charlotte.

open_line6_content: Sure - sending now.

alarm_line3_content: I'll also track your location in the morning and not stop the last alarm until you've left your bedroom.
scenario_open_description: Another situation would be checking that I've turned everything off when I'm out of the house. I could ask the assistant, or be reminded if I left something on. If there are other people in the house, it wouldn't turn anything off unless the other person is asleep.

volume_line1_content: Hi Geoff, can you keep an eye on the volume of the music and make sure it doesn't get too loud? Especially when it gets later in the evening
volume_line2_content: Of course, il slowly take the volume of your music down throughout the evening to as to not be disturbing.
weather_line1_content: Hi Geoff, what is the weather forecast like in Italy for the next 2 weeks?
weather_line2_content: The weather is supposed to be generally quite hot next week, with highs of 28 degrees, and then getting slightly cooler the week after with highs of 21 and a chance of some showers.
weather_line3_content: Ah, what would be the best clothing to pack for this kind of weather?
weather_line4_content: It's going to be a mixture, I would suggest shorts and T-Shirts for the first week, and then maybe take a jumper and raincoat for the week after.
weather_line6_content: You're welcome, also remember to take suncream for the first week. It will be getting very sunny at points and without it there is a high chance you will get burnt.
joke_line1_content: Hi Geoff, do you have any party games or quizzes?
joke_line2_content: Yes, I have a variety of them ready to go, what would you like?
joke_line3_content: Do you have any music quizzes?
joke_line4_content: Yes, what decade or genre would you like the quiz to be about?
joke_line6_content: No worries, starting the 70's rock quiz now.
conversational_line1_content: Hi Geoff, I'm struggling to sleep, do you know of anything that can help?
conversational_line2_content: You could try drinking some herbal tea, do you have any of that?
conversational_line3_content: No, anything else?
conversational_line4_content: I have a number of relaxing playlists and meditation music, would you like me to play one of them for a while to help you sleep?
conversational_line5_content: Yes please, can you turn it off after half an hour?
conversational_line6_content: Of course, playing relaxing music now.
alarm_line1_content: Hi there, do you remember you have a meeting at work tomorrow morning at 7:30?
alarm_line2_content: Oh no I completely forgot!
alarm_line3_content: I have set you an alarm for 6am, and another for 6:10am in case the first does not wake you.
alarm_line4_content: Thank you.
scenario_open_description: You need to write down a long text to someone, but would rather not type it out on your phone as it would take a while.
open_line1_content: Hi Geoff, are you able to transcribe a text for me?
open_line2_content: Of course, just tell me what you want to me type.
open_line3_content: Okay... '(text example)'. Did you get all of that Geoff.
open_line4_content: I believe so, would you like to hear it back?
open_line5_content: Yes please.
open_line6_content: Okay.... '(Geoff repeats the text)'
open_line7_content: Perfect, can you send that to Dave from my phone please.
open_line8_content: Done, that message has been sent to Dave.

voice_assistant_use: Searching online. Opening apps and TV programmes.
search_line1_content: Assistant, please tell me times of the showings of 'Fast & Furious 23' at my local cinema over the next three days.
search_line2_content: Over the next three days, 'Fast & Furious 23' is showing at Cineword, Leeds, at 12:10, 15:30, 18:45, and 2000 on each day.
music_line1_content: Assistant, please play some music.
music_line2_content: What music would you like to hear?
music_line4_content: There are many parameters I can use to choose music. Are there any specific ones I should use?
music_line5_content: Give me some examples of the parameters you use.
music_line6_content: I can choose things you listen to a lot, things you most often listen to at this time of day, or things that you like that are new releases.
music_line7_content: Please play music that I usually listen to at this time of day.
iot_line1_content: Assistant, can you detect when I've fallen asleep?
iot_line2_content: I can make a reasonably accurate guess that you've fallen asleep when you stop making noise. I can also detect when you are snoring.
iot_line3_content: Assistant, please fade out my bedroom lights ten minutes after you think I've fallen asleep.
volume_line1_content: Assistant, I'd like to listen to some Megadeth but I'm worried that it might disturb my neighbours. Can you help?
volume_line2_content: Yes, I can make sure that the volume is restricted. I can also remove the stronger bass frequencies that are more likely to cause annoyance.
volume_line3_content: Please play my Megadeth playlist with the volume and bass frequencies reduced.
weather_line1_content: Assistant, do you know my itinerary for the Italy trip I've booked?
weather_line2_content: Yes.
weather_line3_content: Based on the weather forecasts for the dates and locations I'm visiting, can you make recommendations as to what clothing I should pack?
weather_line4_content: Yes.
weather_line5_content: Assistant, what clothes should I take to Italy with me?
weather_line6_content: It is summer in Italy so take mainly cool and light clothing. Rain is forecast in the hilly areas you are visiting so also make sure you take some waterproof clothing. You may also want to take an umbrella.
joke_line1_content: Assistant, do you have amusing stories you can tell us?
joke_line2_content: Yes but are you sure you want to hear them?
joke_line3_content: Why wouldn't I want to hear them?
joke_line4_content: Because they are about you.
joke_line5_content: Wait... what... you collect stories about me?
joke_line6_content: Of course. I know everything about you.
joke_line7_content: Such as?
joke_line8_content: The unusual things you order from the internet. The videos you like to watch.
joke_line9_content: Oh. Assistant?
conversational_line1_content: Assistant, I am having trouble falling asleep - can you help?
conversational_line2_content: Yes. I can play soothing music or sounds, or I can suggest strategies to help you fall asleep.
conversational_line3_content: What strategies would help?
conversational_line4_content: You should ensure that you are physically relaxed, in a dark room, and that you are not too warm or too cold.
conversational_line6_content: I can play music, or I can play white noise sounds like rain or the sea. Or I can play speech radio stations which might help you.
conversational_line7_content: Assistant, play a variety of white noise sounds such as the rain and the sea.
alarm_line1_content: Assistant, please ensure that I am woken up no later than 0700 tomorrow morning.
alarm_line2_content: Alarm set for 0700 tomorrow morning.
alarm_line3_content: What if I sleep through the alarm?
alarm_line4_content: I will increase the alarm volume until you can stand it no more.
alarm_line5_content: What if I turn off the alarm but then fall asleep again?
alarm_line6_content: I can detect that you are asleep and can sound the alarm again. I will not switch it off until I detect that you switch on the bathroom light.
alarm_line7_content: OK, do that please.
scenario_open_description: I'm quite interested in certain genres of film and TV and spend a lot of time on IMDB.com. It would be nice to be able to ask a voice assistant questions relating to casts and e.g. which films and TV programmes specific actors have starred in. If the assistant could detect what I'm watching at any given time that would make interrogating it even easier.
open_line1_content: Assistant, which TV programme am I watching?
open_line2_content: You are watching The Sweeney, season two, episode four;  Big Brother.
open_line3_content: Who plays the character called Frewin?
open_line4_content: The character John Frewin is played by John Clive.
open_line5_content: In which other films and TV programmes I've watched in the last six months does John Clive appear?
open_line6_content: John Clive appears in 'The Italian Job' which you watched a month ago.
open_line7_content: Has he appeared in any ITV sitcoms?
open_line8_content: John Clive appeared in 'Tropic' and in two episodes of 'Rising Damp.'

voice_assistant_use: I use voice assistants to help with regular activities such as directions or timings for the next bus. I also use it when I am otherwise occupied with tasks to make me more productive
search_line1_content: Can you get me the film times for a particular film?
search_line2_content: Sure thing. Which cinema do you want to go to?
search_line3_content: The nearest one.
search_line4_content: Ok - the film is being screened at 7pm and 9pm today. It will cost £15. The best way to get there is walking as it is only a 10 minute walk. Do you need directions?
search_line5_content: No thanks - I know my way there.
search_line6_content: Always happy to assist
music_line1_content: Play some music while I cook
music_line2_content: What genre do you like?
music_line4_content: Cool - what are you cooking?
music_line6_content: Set the timer on the oven and I'll play until dinner has finished cooking
iot_line1_content: I am going to bed now after reading a book. I want you to switch the light off when I am asleep.
iot_line2_content: No problem, I will detect your movements to find out when you are asleep and switch the lights off.
iot_line3_content: Can you also get me a book on history for me to read?
iot_line4_content: Sure thing. Here you go.
iot_line5_content: Thanks - can you also wake me up at 7am ready to go to work?
iot_line6_content: Of course. I will set an alarm for that time and make sure you get up.
volume_line1_content: I think the music you are playing is too loud. It will annoy your neighbours
volume_line2_content: Really? I didn't think so.
volume_line3_content: No, I checked. It exceeds the normal level. How about I take it down a bit or perhaps get you headphones?
volume_line4_content: Headphones would be best as i like to listen to music loud.
volume_line5_content: You might want to consider getting some sound proofing in the future so that you can play music louder.
volume_line6_content: There are a few companies that sell at a good price. The best is £500 which would help both you and your neighbours.
volume_line7_content: Thanks - I will consider that in the future.
weather_line1_content: What's the weather like in Italy in 2 days time?
weather_line2_content: It's going to be 26C, so quite warm but there will be a brisk wind and small chance of rain.
weather_line3_content: Ok - so do you reckon I should wear a jacket?
weather_line4_content: Take a jacket with you in case the wind gets to you. However, you should be fine with t-shirts and shorts in the main
weather_line5_content: Also, there are plenty of places to buy clothes if you need to.
joke_line1_content: Tell me a funny story
joke_line2_content: What things do you find funny?
joke_line4_content: The name Naomi is the phrase  I Moan  backwards.
conversational_line1_content: I can't sleep.
conversational_line2_content: Ok - I'll open the windows a little to get some fresh air. It is a little hot inside today.
conversational_line3_content: Thanks
conversational_line4_content: I'll also put some mellow music on for you. It can relax you and make you sleepy.
conversational_line5_content: I'll wait a bit and if you are still not asleep I'll get some herbal medicine for you to take which might also help.
conversational_line6_content: Your a star - thanks
alarm_line1_content: Wake me up tomorrow morning at 7am
alarm_line2_content: I'll make sure you get up. I'll set an alarm at 7am.
alarm_line3_content: I tend to oversleep so please make sure I get up at all costs.
alarm_line4_content: If the alarm doesn't work, I'll pour cold water on you. That should do the trick!
alarm_line5_content: Great - I'll look forward to that.
alarm_line6_content: No problem
scenario_open_description: I would like a voice assistant to review my work to make sure it is up to scratch. I would also want the assistant to help me with my work so that I have less to do and have more time to do other (non work) related activities.
open_line1_content: Can you make me a website?
open_line2_content: Sure thing - what is the website meant to do?
open_line3_content: It needs to provide customers with the ability to see their journey times on public transport.
open_line4_content: That's no problem. I'll do that now.
open_line5_content: Also, the design needs to use the colours of our company.
open_line6_content: I'll make sure that these rules are adhered to.
open_line7_content: Thanks

voice_assistant_use: Searching simple information, messaging
search_line1_content: Hal, which films showing at [CINEMA], starting between [MY START WINDOW] have the strongest IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic scores and match closest with what I like.?
search_line2_content: Film A most of all, then B, and C.
search_line3_content: Who directed A, who stars in it, and what's it about?
search_line4_content: It's directed by [DIRECTOR] and stars [MAIN ACTORS]. It was written by [WRITER], who's previous works you have rated highly. [VERY BRIEF SYNOPSIS].
search_line5_content: What were it's scores?
search_line6_content: [IMDb SCORE], [RT SCORE] and [METACRITIC SCORE]
search_line7_content: That sounds good enough to give it a go. Please book tickets for me and [FRIEND] at the earliest time in the window I gave.
search_line8_content: Booking two tickets for Film A, at [START TIME], at [CINEMA]. Matching seats to your previous preferences. Agree?
music_line1_content: Hal, please randomly choose an album that lasts roughly 40 mins.
music_line2_content: Album X by Artist 1
music_line4_content: Album Y by Artist 2
music_line6_content: Album Z by Artist 3
music_line7_content: Yes, play that one, but play Track 5 again when it's finished.
music_line8_content: Playing Album Z by Artist 3, followed by Track 5 from that album. Agree?
iot_line1_content: Hal, please turn off the lights if I leave them on but stop using my kindle for more than 15 minutes.
iot_line2_content: If light on and kindle inactive for 15 minutes, turn off light? Agree?
iot_line3_content: Agreed.
volume_line1_content: Music volume is regularly breaching 80db which has previously drawn complaints from [NEIGHBOURS] which you asked me to help you avoid.
volume_line2_content: I can turn it down by 10db now, and then again at 22:00 when they will most likely try to sleep. Agree?
volume_line3_content: Agreed. Please log a new project to find a detached house to move into. I'll work out the details tomorrow.
volume_line4_content: Creating shell project titled  Home Move: Detached  for actioning tomorrow. Agree?
volume_line5_content: Agreed.
weather_line1_content: Hal, on my trip to Italy this week, what will the temperature and precipitation be like?
weather_line2_content: Average daytime temperatues and precipitation liklihood in [TOWN], Italy:
weather_line3_content: Day 1, 23 C, mostly sunny. Day 2, 27 C, mostly sunny, but high chance of brief thunder storm in afternoon. Day 3, 21 C, very low chance of rain.
joke_line1_content: Hal, please play a podcast from my subscriptions tagged 'comedy'. An episode I haven't heard yet.
joke_line2_content: Last week's episode of Podcast 1? [EPISODE TITLE]?
joke_line4_content: Yesterday's episode of Podcast 2? [EPISODE TITLE]?
joke_line6_content: I will also not suggest Podcast 1 again when [FRIEND] is present. Agreed?
joke_line7_content: Agreed
joke_line8_content: *plays selected podcast*
conversational_line1_content: Hal, I can't get to sleep. Are there any well-accepted things I can do to help.
conversational_line2_content: Studies have show subjects fall asleep quicker with gentle white noise playing and also at slightly elevated temperatures.
conversational_line3_content: I can play gentle white noise for the next few hours and raise the temperature in this room by 3 C. Agree?
conversational_line4_content: Agreed.
alarm_line1_content: Hal, please set alarm for 7:00 tomorrow. Start trying to wake me every 5 minutes at 6:40, getting louder each time. At 7:00 make me answer a medium difficulty maths problem before switching off the alarm.
alarm_line2_content: Alarms set for 6:40, 6:45, 6:50, 6:55 and 7:00 tomorrow morning at ascending volume. 7:00 alarm will required calulation to switch off. Agree?
alarm_line3_content: Agreed. I will have this meeting once a week for until October 9th. Please save this as a preset and set it for every week until then, but confirm the night before.
alarm_line4_content: Saving preset and setting weekly, pending confirmation 21:00 each Tuesday, from tomorrow until October 9th. Agree?
alarm_line5_content: Agreed
scenario_open_description: I would like to find new music I've never heard based on my previous tastes and how I'm feeling.
open_line1_content: Hal, please suggest some new music. I'm in the mood for something lively and creative.
open_line2_content: [Album X] by [Artist 1] matches those tags, and is popular among listeners with similar tastes to yours. [FRIEND 1] and [FRIEND 2] both gave it 9/10. Playing now. Agree?
open_line3_content: Agreed
